lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First, beginning with our fantastic sponsor of campaign two, up to this point and going forward for hopefully infinity, D&D Beyond. Sam, if you want to take it away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will indeed. Guys, D&D Beyond will be streaming tomorrow, June 15th, live from Origins Game F-- Uh-oh. I've forgotten something in my car. Laura, take over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, no, what is he doing to me? --from Origins Game Fair! Check out twitch.tv/DnDBeyond-- N, not &-- starting at 12:00 pm Eastern time, to catch interviews, the monthly D&D Beyon-- What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Buenos noches, I am the masked vigilante named Storro. I fight injustice and defend the innocent in order to send them to the D&D Beyond Store-o.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mine is a dangerous cause, filled with scary monsters, vile beasts, devilish devils. All of them can be found in the various Monster Manuals at the D&D Beyond Store-o. Aha! What is this?! It is a generic tablet device, displaying a handsome array of content and inventory to streamline your tabletop gameplay. Why, this can only be the infamous handiwork of D&D Beyond. With my blade, I cut down on prep time, I slice my physical book collection in half, I slay the enemies of book management? For I am (click click click) Storro! And I will never stop fighting until our D&D Beyond contract expires! And then I will stop fighting! Hyah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who was that masked man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, guys! What did--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you find what you needed in your car, Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know what? It was right here, it was this thing. Check out twitch.tv/DnDBeyond starting at 12:00 pm Eastern time to catch interviews, the monthly D&D Beyond dev update, Q&A, and a live play session with exclusive reveals from Dwarven Forge's upcoming KS6. I don't know what that is!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their sixth Kickstarter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! You didn't plan a commercial at all this time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't plan any commercial today, it was just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was a guy that-- you know what? It's not important. Great job.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, buddy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know the thing when you find a mask at home and you're like, "I can do a bit with this!" That's the whole thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently only U.S and Canada, excluding Quebec, are eligible to enter and win because of dumb rules. Also a reminder that Twitch Prime allows you, if you have your Amazon Prime account, to attach with your Twitch account to subscribe to a channel for free on Twitch once a month. If you can, do so. It's free. And that is it, and that's all; short announcements tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: EVERYONE
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Instantly started crying looking at this book. The rules, "When you finish with this book, email Jason, yadda yadda, if you use a medium that bleeds-- "Decorate it, send it on to the next person." It's been traveling. The very first one, I'll find some-- Kat Winslade has done art for ages. I can't. I just can't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! It's Darragh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The audience will all see it. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There will be tears at break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (fake crying) Okay, we'd better start the game!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, you spent an evening resting, and began heading back out to return from the northern center of Labenda Swamp towards the town of Berleben, and to where the next leg of your journey takes you. Mighty Nein, as you begin heading southward into the daytime of the thick, heavy swamp, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forget, are we returning back to report in between missions, or are we doing a twofer?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can send a message to the Gentleman, so we don't have to go back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How can you do that? He's terribly far away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep wanting to use this spell that I have, but I haven't been able to do it yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What spell's that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's called Sending.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sending?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I can send a message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a literal description.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess that would cover it, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's one of my most powerful spells, you guys, so if we're going to fight somebody, I don't know if it's smart.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you send an actual message, or is it a piece of paper?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a piece of paper of the mind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You lost me a little.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shouldn't we get out of the swamp first? What if there are scaries around?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What time is it about, in the sky parts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I recall, you guys had taken a long rest after your previous battle, so now it's mid-morning, I'd say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, maybe not just yet. Maybe before we go to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At the end of the day?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, like so many good things, we can do it back when we get to the hotel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Do we want to go find that troll guy?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: To get that 100 gold back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did almost die, which was pretty awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And remember, he bleeds damaging liquids.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we stay far away this time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have any more boom-boom sticks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we have one. We can go blow up his house. That seems petty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or something that we would totally do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He almost killed me and definitely killed our guide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we should blow up his house.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm down for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two votes. Three votes. Four, five votes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I defer to the group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you abstaining?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Okay, let's go. I do not have a cat in this hunt, but whatever you want to do, I will support.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Throw it in and see how it goes, and then we can run if he's-- How do we know if he's in there, though?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can sneak up, take a look, rob it, and then throw a stick of dynamite in just because, if we're going to be those people. What happens if he's actually there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what do you mean by "those people"? Do you know a lot of people who throw dynamite in houses?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I feel like that's pretty obvious, at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like I knew that about you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just like having a game plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Maybe we have Nott bolt in, right, everybody else stand back, because you're super fast, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very dextrous?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, then you run in and toss that sucker. If he pops out, we light it up from afar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm going to be carrying an explosive device into a troll's house, solo?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you just throw it in the door. You don't have to walk in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to play troll's advocate here, what if it's not his house?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. That's the thing, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we're blowing up an innocent troll's house?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then we should rob it first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll send Frumpkin in first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There'll be a body curing, if it is his house. We'll know, because there'll be a body curing and getting nice and ripe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We also had no qualms about sending a highly decorated richter to the guillotine, so I don't know why we are getting tied up over a troll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel that as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He definitely has 100 gold on him. Just saying. Possibly so much more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go check it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's on the way back, anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll give you the dynamite, and if anything seems like it goes wrong, you can immediately signal Caleb, and we'll bring the cavalry in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You remember where those damn daggers are in the trees?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I remember the way. This way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is your marching order, if I could ask?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh boy. I am right behind whoever's in the lead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Who's in the lead, guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go behind Caleb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go behind Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll go next to Molly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take up the rear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 30 feet to the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Kiri will stay with Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, she can ride on my shoulders again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Frumpkin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin is scarfing it on my shoulders.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. Fjord, does that mean you're leading through? Who's responsible for navigating?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a couple steps behind Fjord, saying "that way" once in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm glad that's you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get a gold star, very good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You follow the pearl-handled daggers along the treeline until eventually, you break southward to the northern side of the Ounterloch. You continue to follow it southwestward from your current position, curving around the outside of the lake. Eventually, you make your way back to the treeline where you were before. At one point, there's a faint shift in the greenery-- looks like a vine maybe has moved-- and you, recognizing the placement of it, manage to stop Fjord from stepping into it. As you pull him back, you guys watch as there is now a cluster of vines at the base of one of these trees, and what looks like thorns on them, appear to be jagged and in rows--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a trap? Or is it organic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, DM, could you say that again because I was busy rubbing it into Travis that Caleb is stronger than Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vines.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw a patch of vines that were tangled at the base of one of these trees that you managed to stop Fjord before stepping into the area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we recognize these vines and what kind of plant this is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see how this goes. No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a scan and look around?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, it could be a trap, come look and see if it's a trap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm coming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a scan and see if I see anybody responsible for making the vines move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, man, it's pretty bad. Eight. Nope, ten. Still getting used to my stats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anybody responsible for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will visually inspect it for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We want the numbers, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seem slack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I follow the vines along and see where they're coming from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look at them, they're just centered there at the base. They either might be coming out from under the tree or part of a plant network right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a weird idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's walk around them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody back up a bit. I'm going to take a little bit of my jerky, I'm going to wrap it around a ball bearing, make a little baseball out of it. I'm going to chuck it right into the middle of the vines.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, no! It's good jerky!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Do it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you hear Beau's words, "It's good jerky!", you watch as the vines suddenly wrap around where it was and begin to coalesce and twist around it. You watch as they tighten and tear and hold there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love camping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feed me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then they begin to slowly shift in your direction. The vines-- (moving noises)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Back up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, it's one of those things again, just go around it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's just run! We're just going to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not very quick. You watch as this poor cluster of jagged vines, different than the man-trap you'd encountered before, slowly circle around and eventually give up after you guys very easily make your distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I throw little bits of moldy pastries at it because I feel sorry for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww, feeding the plants.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it throws it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't seem to have much interest in them, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's still really good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It'll get hungry. Maybe later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pressing on, you're heading back to Berleben, or are you searching for this hollow you found before?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was leading everyone back to where this troll was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another survival check for me, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know exactly the direction of north, and I remember where we were, that is a nine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know we're going to get lost in this swamp forever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I have perfect memory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have firm memory of directions. You know which direction you're traveling, and you have--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it all looks the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You don't have the ability to suddenly know where everything is that you've been. You have a good sense of it, and you can guide better than most, given most circumstances. But you also have not grown up in a swamp, and after a while, the pattern recognition begins to fade a bit and you discover, after you've been circling for a bit, stumbling upon your own footfalls, you've lost about two hours of travel in the middle of the swamp.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks just the way I remembered it though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we circled around for two hours the first time and we just didn't realize it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's entirely possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Following that, heading in the western direction from where you were, eventually you come across that similar sound: distant chimes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those were the bone chimes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no! That's scarier than wind chimes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we be stealthy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we should be stealthy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I cast Pass Without a Trace on us?

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that all of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Stay within 30 feet of me, okay?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Big times are coming, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a troll house.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bless you. Now you have advantage on stealth checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So are you all staying back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How far back are you staying?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should we do a circle, surround the perimeter, just in case?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do a semicircle around where the door is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, this will make it easy to establish the scenario.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got a map.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We remember what not to do, right, which is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't attack him up close. Don't let him get close to us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah guys, distance is key.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is the hollow, with the central tree there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we're coming from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are coming this direction, so north would be that direction. You guys are heading this way. Where would you guys like to be placed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Semicircle right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to be on the absolute side of the semicircle, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this rough terrain, is this swampy or is this normal ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's normal ground where it's green and then rough terrain where it's water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, that's-- Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri has her dagger out and is currently--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Kiri, stay behind this tree next to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, behind it. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hiding in that tree.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel a little exposed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott's over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. As you're preparing yourself, Kiri looks over to you with a big smile with the dagger out and goes (as Jester), "I don't know if it's smart."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kiri, I don't either. Give me the boomstick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who has the boomstick?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have the boomstick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, be stealthy. You have advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I doing? I'm going to see if this is the troll's place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to see if the troll is inside--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to take everything that you can grab in there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Frumpkin's not going in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an unnecessary step. Just blow that thing up, man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the troll's not in there, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then you blow it up anyway!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we can go steal stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we go steal stuff and bounce?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then blow it up and run.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So find out if he's in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is Frumpkin dead? Not to be insensitive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just touched his tail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, hey buddy. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he should go in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe we send Frumpkin first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But Frumpkin's not as-- I mean, yes, that would be great. But Frumpkin's not as stealthy as I am.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want, I can go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You cast Pass without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it's only up to 30 feet away from her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have advantage, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, go in there, Nott. Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to run up, stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll your stealth with advantage, Nott, as you come up along the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: It's not plus ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It has to be within 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Caleb, you've got plus ten right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As quietly as you can, you turn around the corner, walk this little swampy land bridge, dipping down to about your waist in swamp water, but in a very slow, steady path, begin to emerge, your foot finding the roots at the base of this large, now hollowed tree. You turn around the corner--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm wearing my Ring of Waterwalking, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, you do actually. So you (tip tap) across it. The softest ninja run you've ever seen. You can almost hear Dance of the Sugar Plum Fairies as you go. Glancing inside, you do see currently in the process of chewing something. You hear a crunching sound, and then a slurping sound, and then some subtle (eating noises).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smoke that for me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will stealthily back away so there's no way he can see me. To the side, and I will--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, can we all hold our attacks for as soon as the troll comes out of the tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to hold actions when it comes to it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll hold Eldritch Blast until he's visible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will hold Fire Bolt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hold a throwing star.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially it would be a surprise round, so you wouldn't have to worry about holding necessarily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't seem to know you're there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I able to light the boom-boom stick?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have flint and steel in your equipment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we send him out there without matches?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Great idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have thieves' tools? And I have acid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, sneak back here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out the wire and say, "What are you doing? Throw it in!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have a match!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. I could light it from here if you just toss it down and dive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have... I probably can't hear you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, you throw a Fireball and make it go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to come back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my God!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott scoots back around the corner. As you guys are all waiting patiently,

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's it look?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or something, or light something on fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just use your thing! Don't you have, like, Burning Hands or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's hard to control.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just light a finger on fire and just touch the thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a tinderbox.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great! Great!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But is it a long wick?

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about that long.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, geez!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could run and do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intelligence? Eight plus something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intelligence check. 11?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11? You have some understanding of basic alchemy; you know probably the way this is treated it won't burn super fast. You're not sure. You could have anywhere between 24 to six seconds once lit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is such a drunk Fourth of July problem.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have full running speed, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go with him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got Pass Without Trace, just go with him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you want me to die?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll look really cool when you're running away from it, though, when it's exploding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast Mage Hand to hold the dynamite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go ahead and light it, Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, so where are you, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am near Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you move over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get behind that tree and activate my swords.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to get within 30 feet of Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both swords ignited.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, dear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm within 30 feet of Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you move over here with Yasha, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there's now this floating piece of dynamite just kind of gliding over the swamp. You hear the insects buzzing and various dragonflies making their way through. So you have it now floating in front of you, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'll light it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! I'm going to move toward the thing and make Mage Hand go in front of me all the way into the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get right around this corner. Make another stealth check as you've now dilly-dallied around for a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good, you still have advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're within 30 feet, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! And plus ten!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No idea you're there. But there is a faint (hissing) sound and from the inside you see the shifting movement of the large hulking troll beast on the inside of the hollow kind of pause for a second in the middle of chewing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The mage hand is going in!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Silence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you do? (massive explosion)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I could get a pair of scissors, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? You're going to cut your beautiful work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you kindly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, it's got roots and all sorts of beautiful things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "If I could get a pair of scissors, please?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we start bringing cherry bombs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Attack, attack, attack!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so first off--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was the coolest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disadvantage on its dexterity saving throw; fails. Go ahead and roll 2d6 for me please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's only 2d6 of damage? Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's some stale dynamite.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a bottle rocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see pieces of shrapnel go flying in every direction. The only one who is not currently protected is you, Nott. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On my own blast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, not from the blast. This is from the shrapnel of the tree hollow that has exploded outwards in all directions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm unprotected.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're far enough away where I don't think it would get to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. You take half damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you take so much more--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's harder to hit from a distance, at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From a distance, yeah. However, I need everyone to roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did this to ourselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes! Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's aware that you guys are there now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, for the purposes of this, I'll give you each one action to do something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not me, I did my action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was just so scared to death. He went, "Ah!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural 20 on his-- Sorry, Caleb was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Nott, was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20. Where's that music, Matt?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want to know yours first all the time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to know what you rolled.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Mine is like, two!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There you go, come on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 12. Moving on up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you got, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord got a four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A fjour.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A fjour by Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think this is a surprise round. The troll cannot act this turn. We'll just let it go that way, because he'd be going up with you, Caleb, on the same turn. He's on the ground, dazed and stunned. What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A Firebolt goes from my hand. That is a natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, come on now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With my Vax die, we will use this one. That is a three-- 11. Doubled is 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 points of fire damage. Nice. The bolt impacts, the flame curls across his now currently black, blasted chest and back area. The flames, as you noticed in a previous battle, has prevented its regeneration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He can regenerate?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't; he's burned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They do normally, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the battles you've had and from watching the previous strike, you now notice the impact, and as the time progresses over the next round, the wounds are not knitting themselves back together. So, that finishes your turn. Are you going to move?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. I'll stay where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Caleb's go. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll shoot my crossbow and miss, with a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage because he's currently prone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disadvantage? I already missed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just wanted to see if you rolled lower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. First shot misses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I get another one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm letting you guys have a full surprise round, because technically he's dazed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's no good. 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 does not hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It manages to ricochet off of the outer parts of its hide. Even though it's burnt and scarred, it's still thick. You watch as the bolt reflects off it. Molly, you're up and then Beau.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to come out from behind my tree right there, just a little bit so I can see him. I'm going to try and Enthrall him, because I don't have any good stuff that I can do from a distance.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) From a distance!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spell DC on that is charisma-based, so it's a ten, correct?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it charisma-based? That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of your racial abilities are charisma-based.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because it says wisdom I get so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 12, so it does not succeed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does not succeed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, sorry, I mean--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does succeed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action. You still have 25 feet of movement if you want do anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actually going to sort of stand out in the-- I'm going to move a couple feet out-- there. And just start yelling at him: Hey-- hey you fucker, you got-- We got more than that! Where we-- Come on! Bring it! I don't know what I'm doing! Too much caffeine!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The wires crossed!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That all happened in there. That all happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Molly's turn. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good thing nobody in the world saw that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to move up my speed pretty far, because I think I have to be within 20 feet for these darts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keeping on the green, you can get about there, and he is within 20 feet of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you not get within close range of him again?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are just inching up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have throwing darts that only go 20 feet, and I'm a melee fighter, man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He stole you last time. You should have PTSD from this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you met Beau?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage on the attacks, because he's prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh right, okay. First attack. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A natural 20 and a seven! So 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses, unfortunately, but the first strike does hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get up there and grapple him, and I'll send projectiles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sucks. Four damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four points of damage to the troll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend a ki point--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you throw it, you watch as it splinters off of its body and there is a splash of poisonous toxin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a rock in his face!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, like a pebble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a pebble! I'm going to use a ki point to do Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you go into your defensive stance, preparing for any sort of assault towards you. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did I go my full speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you didn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I move back a little?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One more, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, there you go. Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to move close to it. May I hold my action until it gets--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a surprise attack, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know it's a surprise attack, I just don't have any ranged weapons or anything. I can go up and hit him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you. If you don't move, you don't get to move later until your next turn. So if you're going to move, do it now, and then hold your action for whatever trigger you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, let me move around by Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, next to Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're holding an attack?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm holding an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that finishes Yasha's turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's me! I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon right above it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right above it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's going to hit him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll for your attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not at disadvantage, because it's melee, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Technically it's at advantage, because it is prone. I imagine it's considered a melee attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 plus something, so that definitely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits, roll damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's five plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage as the lollipop (whack) slams down onto its body. It rears back. This awkward, sickly looking creature being bashed by beautiful, glistening, divine lollipop. It's a unique visual.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat it, troll! Then I am going to use my bonus action to ring a spiritual bell and Toll the Dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mean you used your bonus action for the Spirit, and your action for the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, that's what I mean! He's got to make a wisdom save of 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! So that's 2d12!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah it is!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rock it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! 14!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Making up for last week!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently. All righty, that ends Jester's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll move forward ten feet, and, with my bonus action, cast Hex on him for strength checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, strength checks are denied onto him for disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Denied, and I'll launch two Eldritch Blasts in his direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, both at disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a ten on the first; that's going to miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses over top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 19 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit, roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven! Seven points of damage! Wait, and a d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A d6 from your Hex, don't forget that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Another four, total of ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, technically.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is he looking rough?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's looking pretty rough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round, Caleb and the troll going at the same time. Because you are going at the same time with the enemy, roll a dexterity check. Roll a d20, add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pretty high, I reckon. Nope, that is a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going before you. Gets up in its space, that's half his movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, he's so ugly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 15.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ha ha ha!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't laugh yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to use an action to dash forward in front of you.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we can't fucking hit him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't attack him until you guys move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? He's not. He's going to stay there, and instead he's going to go ahead and use his venom spray. It lumbers forward, it's darkened, with angry, blasted soot and flame scars, it rumbles toward you, its strange bulbous midsection wobbling as it steps through the swamp towards you. It looks like an even more swollen Meg Mucklebones from Legend. Reaches up with its claw and tears a giant wound across its chest. As it does, dark green venomous liquid sprays out in a 15-foot cube in front of it, hitting both of you. I need you both to make a constitution saving throw, please. It takes seven points of damage from its own claw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We had to have 100 gold, didn't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does my Patient Defense do anything here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is not about the gold, Fjord!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a reckoning!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just a straight roll, yeah? 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you just make it. The DC was 16.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hah. You're like, I made it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I made it. You're telling me there's a chance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is exactly what you needed. 18 points of poison damage to you, Yasha, and you are poisoned for one minute.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take nine points of poison damage, Beau, and you are not poisoned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you can save against that, right? Every turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. At the end of each turn, you can repeat the saving throw to try and get rid of the poison, so that's going to end its turn. Next, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will move as close as I can, probably getting close to Mollymauk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he within splashing range of you all? Did you just get hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, not with blood spray.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll hit him with Magic Missile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The basic level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three missiles. 3d4 plus three, go ahead and roll that up. Nott, you're up next.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three, four, eight. 11 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will fire once. Am I at disadvantage or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I still missed. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does miss, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we seeing sprays when he gets hit by these things, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each Magic Missile, the spray is still jumping off of its body in these very proximity-based sprays of terrible toxin. So yeah, it's still happening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I scoot back behind that tree to the west?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you only making the one attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll make another one when I get over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I go farther around? Just as far around as I can-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're rushing past.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That one hits. 19 plus something. This is not a sneak attack, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, poo. Six points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage to it. As the bolt sticks in the back, you watch as one of its bulbous pustules sprays venom behind it, impacting nothing in its proximity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far does it look like the pustules spray?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between five and ten feet, you're not entirely certain from your visible standpoint, because you're kneeling behind a tree with partial cover. That finishes Nott's turn. Molly, you're up. Then Beau, you're on deck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far can I move in one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to head in the direction of this creature. I'm going to stay about-- Actually, let's try something ridiculous. You took a lot of damage from that spray, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine. Not as much as Yasha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This'll be fun. Let's run up to it, see how close I can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In order to make it with your distance, you're going to have to leap across that bit of open swamp water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: By that spiritual weapon. If I can leap there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll be the rest of your movement. You'll be right there and that'll be the end of your movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. At least it'll hopefully give everybody some flanking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You trip and fall down to your knees in the water. 20, 25, and that's about as far as you can move on this turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's as far as I can move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use an action to dash if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold my action in case he comes within fighting distance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're holding your attack?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm holding my attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I do anything with my bonus? I can't do anything with my bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Does that end your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I think that ends my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Yasha. Yeah?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out my oil flask and I undo it and I douse him with oil, power-of-Christ-compels-you style.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your first attempt to spray it, it dissipates in front of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Throw it at him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 plus your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's 15 feet away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sees it coming towards it and (whooshing) past its head, and you hear it (shattering) somewhere in the distance. You glance past it, and there's a pile of skulls and bones that were previously charred from the impact that currently now are doused in oil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That didn't go as planned. Sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to move?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to step back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Run. (singing) Sail away, sail away, sail away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much, full movement?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As far as you can. Get as far as you can!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, a little bit more. I'm going to go behind that tree there. Yep, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends Beau's turn. End of Beau. Yasha, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I know we can't go up and slash, and that's all I can do, but can I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're just going to take damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't do it. I'll just take damage. I'm already low.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We healed up. We got a long rest.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I know. I'm already nervous. Could I take a torch and throw it at him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I'll let you do that. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe there's some oil flecks on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20; add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll better than Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do better than me!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no. Seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it at least land where the oil landed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does! You see behind, a pile of freshly dampened, oil-covered skulls burns like a nice little bonfire behind him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is he looking at it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks at it, and looks back at you about as incredulously as a troll can, like--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go back as far as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I should have actually rolled at disadvantage on that, but it would have been the same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We still would have sucked.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Still would have been shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a tiny burning fire there now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I roll for a save on the poison?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, at the end of your turn. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would have been really cool in theory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would have been.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to shrug off the poison.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From out of the flames comes the spiritual weapon from behind and it's going to come up and spank him on the butt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Heavy metal lollipop.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, lollipop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 just misses. It strikes across its shoulder but glances off and slams into the wet, sickening swamp floor with a (sucking) sound. It has to pull itself out by wedging back and forth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw man. I pop out from behind the tree and say, "I was aiming for your butt." And then I'm going to cast Guiding Bolt at level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit. All right. Roll your attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it, fuck, mother bitch. No, it doesn't hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a lot of threes in this game right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as behind, (booming).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no! It's got a mate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A tree blasts back from the Guiding Bolt, slamming into already rotted roots, needed that one final nudge, and the tree behind uproots itself and falls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you guys see how powerful that was? Super powerful. I'm going to run away. I'm going to turn around and run the other direction. Yep, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends Jester's turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to move over here. Five, ten, 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going closer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to cast Witch Bolt at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Level one? What level you have to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, whatever it is. 3d12. I have to roll to hit first. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 does hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hi, d12. I missed you. (counting) 18 points. Lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus a d6 because it has Hex on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for the reminder. Two. Solid 20 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points of damage. I'm putting this on there for Witch Bolt, so if you wanted to use your action again, you can continue to hit it every turn for a d12 automatically. Now you see, as Fjord steps around the corner and releases this arcing bolt of purplish-black energy, this lightning arcs off and slams into the troll. The energy continues to swirl around it. It tries to stop it and grasp for it to no effect. There's this strange thread of faintly visible energy between it and Fjord right now. There's some sort of connection between the two of them. All right, that ends your turn, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The troll's going to go first because it rolled higher than Caleb. Immediately, it turns--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's real angry at him because it just got Hexed, Blasted, and then Bolted. It's going to bypass the shiny swords right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it get close enough for me to take a swing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Swing, swing. I just get two attacks, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were holding your action, so you get two attacks, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I'm going to use the good sword. It doesn't matter. That's awful, and that's pretty good. That's 11, that misses, and 19, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 1d6 plus 1d4. 2d6 now, that's right. That's not bad. That's ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten points of damage, as you strike it with one blade and miss with another. Immediately, as you strike across it with your blade, the venom splashes into your face. You suffer 13 points of poison damage, and then it moves out of your combat range. You can still take your reaction if you wanted to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will take my reaction. 13 points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm taking it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 100 gold!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: New die.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a pretty gold die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the fact that I'm using what effect I have--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not appear to be undead. So it's 2d6 plus, and then double whatever you roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So it's 4d6 plus a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you wanted to do it that way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. That pretty much does the same thing. (counting) 21 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's coming into you. As soon as that arm goes limp, the muscle reconnects and the arm comes back with strength, angrily. It's going to swing. It's going to take a bite and two claw attacks against you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's also going to, of course, Curse of the Eyeless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't. You already used your reaction to attack him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that was my reaction. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, buddy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For its bite attack against you, its jaws open, Fjord. That is going to be a 26.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take ten points of piercing damage, plus six points of poison damage, and you are poisoned until the start of its next turn, as the venom courses through your veins. Its teeth and giant tusks dug into the front of your shoulder and chest. The pain is strong, but it's holding you fast. From there, like a clawed wolverine, it begins to rake at your chest with its claws on each side. The first one's going to be a 16 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the other claw strike--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he grappled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. He is not. That is nine plus four. 13 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched yelp) I mean, (deeper grunt).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And another three points of poison damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jeez Louise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to end its turn.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Run away!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, this thing is way closer than I was prepared for. I take a little bit of molasses and rub it on my hands and say: slow down. You boys have got this? Good. And I start to back away, casting Slow as I go. I will loop around by our cleric. He has to beat a wisdom save against 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom save? That is a 14 minus one. 13, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that do to it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It slows him, I think!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half movement, he can only make a single attack on its turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He can do an attack or a bonus, but not both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is my fault. Hex is gone, and make constitution saving throws to see if you're maintaining your Witch Bolt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's an 11. That one saves. They both save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Good on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it was four. You can add four hit points, I think was the last Hex damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was a cube, but Caleb, knowing that, would put the troll in the corner and send the rest of it in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I assumed as much. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't use reactions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caleb, that finish your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it in melee with good old Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thank god. I mean, not for you. I'll run up within 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, you move (counting) 30, there you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And fire! Ooh, good, it's a lot! 20-something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage. It's hurt real bad now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's 13 plus four is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of damage. And splash! Fjord, you take nine points of poison damage right into your face as the bolt slashes through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My eyes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I forgot about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let it stop you not, my friend! Nott? Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, do let it stop me, or don't?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, keep hitting it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's holding on, barely. It's right there, angrily making a last stand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cock again and fire again! And it's even more! 20-something to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only six points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points, still alive. Fjord, you take another 13 points of poison damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do?! Hit it again! (spraying)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I killed something!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, nobody hit it because Fjord's going to take serious damage!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just hit it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's standing, heavily breathing like (panting).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll keep taking damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, I use my Relentless Endurance to (singing).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about to go-- (straining). The orc comes to. The blood of the half-orc kicks in, and you stand there angrily in its face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nobody else hit it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord, run!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just hit it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk up, and I'm going to flank it so I get advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up to your waist in swamp water, looking up at it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a hit. That's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, that hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's nine points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to get the new sword, push, let it bend, and pop into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you stab through its body, it tries to spin and you watch this strange tensing of its abdominal muscles and its weird bulbous stomach suddenly bursts out in front of you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you take ten points of poison damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah! It was so cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looked almost like Molly killed them both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sizzling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two birds, Molly. I like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good one, Molly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord is currently unconscious on the ground, guys. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he's poisoned, too, isn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know. You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a bonus action. I'm going to give him an auto-cure, just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so roll a constitution saving throw to resist it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The snake tattoo on my hand, the eye on the back of my hand bursts, and blood comes pouring out of it. I take two points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, did you amplify?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't need the amplify. Oh, actually that's right, I don't have to take damage for that, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you watch as, where the snake is, the blood bursts and the green venom that's currently coursing through the wounds in Fjord's unconscious body suddenly (sucking noise) siphons out, hovers in the air for a moment, as Mollymauk is holding his hand. And then the poison drops to the ground and disseminates into the swamp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What? That is so cool!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never done that before. That--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, are you awake then, Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord is still unconscious. The poison's gone but he's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what happened? Oh, he was just unpoisoned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll walk up to Fjord. And I'll cast Cure Wounds at level one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whenever you cure anyone, it feels like a bother.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, it's so begrudgingly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll tap his head and be like: Wake up already.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it look like it's regenerating at all?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll start looking for the gold.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could just cut off its head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I join Nott in looking for the gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to make your way over to the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pretty fucking fast. I'm pretty damn fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kiri, come out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri begins to run around, joining over here in the swamp area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't poke it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't stab the corpse this time, it's poisonous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "It's poisonous." You're looking down at it and watching as parts of the wounds are still tethering together.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, let's like, I'm going to gently--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hasn't come back to your turn yet, unfortunately. Its turn's before that. You watch as it suddenly comes up from the ground, pulling itself from the swamp, now conscious once more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched scream)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please don't.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come. On!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it's going to take another heavy swing towards Fjord. With advantage, because you're prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you already Cure Wounds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be 20 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Jester. (death rattle)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be seven points of piercing damage, and two points of poison.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord falls unconscious once more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (death rattle)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just like Blink.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Time is weird for Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I should have had a-- Oh well, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it comes back around to the next turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah. Six seconds can go quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as it comes back, it heals ten hit points back up. So it came to consciousness. Just enough movement to get up from prone, knock Fjord down. It's going to make another swipe at Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can it do that if it's Slowed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it can't!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it still Slowed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, thank god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still Slowed, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just saved Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was two death saving throws right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it had a third attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It had another one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it doesn't anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it doesn't anymore.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like walking on the edge of a cliff in the middle of the night. And you didn't know how far the drop was, and you're just toeing the edge. No idea what was on the other side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Fjord is unconscious. Brings us back, Caleb, it is now your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, is it? Oh goodness, this is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As everyone's rushed around, it's got back up, and just (slamming noise) Fjord's unconscious again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have Thunder Wave or anything that can push it back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, in everything that I've seen, when fire has been used on this creature, did it splurt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seemed to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It seemed to splurt when I used fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any sort of damage seemed to cause it to splurt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire also did bad things to it and it didn't regenerate. `

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, but Fjord is right under it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just do it. Just do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just save your attack--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it's at its turn, and now we're back at the round so it's going to have another turn immediately?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. That was its turn it just took. So now we're going back to the initiative order again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all have our actions, so hold your attack 'cause I'll pull Fjord away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So now we have our full turn and it can't react, so hold the-- I can move, I'll be fine. We all get a full turn before anything happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Caleb shouts out, should I burn this thing now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait one second!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait until I can pull him away!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'll hold on a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Real fast, hold on, I'm just checking Slow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ahh! No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This has suddenly become the most complicated fight we've ever had!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets to make a wisdom saving throw to see if it can avoid Slow. No, it rolled a three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (funny voice) Ah, sorry buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Caleb, what are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just yell, should I burn it? And Jester yelled, "Wait."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hold!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to hold the Glove of Blasting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to burn it the moment Fjord is in the clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're holding until Fjord is clear from his body. Got it. Okay, that brings us to Nott. Nott, what are you doing? You turn around and watch as the troll's now back up and slammed its claw into Fjord's now, once again, unconscious body.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold until we're clear!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Ahh! (scared, nervous noises) I want to so bad! Am I within 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently? You can very easily get within 30 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get within 30 feet and then hold my action to shoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step around the flaming pile of skulls right there. And turn and get another bolt and-- you're holding?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm holding the attack until it looks like it's safe to do so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, holding the attack until Fjord's safe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Until Fjord's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. All right, Molly, your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I obviously can't hit it so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got your...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to get his attention, peace out. I'm going to Misty Step.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, dude.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where do you want to go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can go 30 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 feet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep, yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go get the shinies before Nott.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to head to the shinies. I'm going to Misty Step next to-- yeah, there we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right behind the fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe I'll just go back and hit it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You won't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just need visual and just... no, there's nothing I can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finishes Molly's turn. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are the two of you going to try and drag? Or do you want to try and attack and Yasha and I can drag?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Figure it out guys, it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to run up, since I know me and Yasha are together. I'm going to cast Step of the Wind, to give myself double movement, or use a ki point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, 30. You don't even have to, to get to it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm trying to get to Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, to get to Fjord, sorry. 40, 50, that's 60.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I would have gone a straight way, but yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now you have used all your movement and you can't pull him away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Step of the Wind, I have double movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 40. So you have, that's your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. And I'm going to grab onto him and I'm going to turn to Yasha and I'm going to say, Help me, and I'm going to pull when she gets up to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you spend an action just to hold onto him. You currently have him grappled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to pull when she gets up. I'm going to help her pull him out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got it. Yasha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I'm going to move forward, grab the other side, that she doesn't have, and pull him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you move over, action, and you're going to pull him away. All righty, you are not in melee range so you manage to pull him back here. Fjord, you get--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has no reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord is now right there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How far back can I pull him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to assist her, though. Can we get him further if I assist? That was the whole point of me doing that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm. It gets a little wonky with action, but I'll let you do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the speed you have left, you guys can pull him about there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If not, if she can handle him, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's half speed through the swamp, and then it's half speed dragging somebody. So it's a slow shift because you're moving through the muck and dragging him out of this thick swamp. So that's as far as you can get.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not get any reaction though, because it's currently still affected by the Slow spell and it looks like right now Fjord is in a position where he is outside of the splash radius. Which would trigger Caleb and Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scorching Ray.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Firing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fire, and you are using the Scorching Ray from the glove.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. First is a 20, second is an 18, and the third is a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They all hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 22 to hit for me. But it's not a sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage. No. There's nobody in range of it right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (disgustedly) Five points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage. It's still conscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill him, kill him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five points, if you get more than five points he's dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did. A total of 27.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is-- I am with these people! And I am going to burn his head off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn, the glove sparking as you release these three blasts, one strikes his chest and ignites, his arm begins to burn black. This one hits the other shoulder and you watch as the torso begins to ignite. The third one finally hits right in the jaw and you see the shadowed line of its face, eyes and mouth open before (fire crackling). Incinerated to ash. I need you to go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fünf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb's arms kind of just fall slack, and he slumps to his knees, staring at the now-flaming corpse of the troll as it slumps into the ground and begins to burn, half-submerged in swamp water, half of it now just this burning mass of ash and flesh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was really graphic!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he's still down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, are you dead or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, we've got to wake him up now! Cause he's almost dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh. I go over and I use another--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a death saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --healing spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine, all right. It's fine. I just like making him roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! I do Cure Wounds on him again. Stop doing this!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ugh. I feel like this is a rough day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. 11 points this time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
