lines.text: 11 points? I sit back up against the tree and sit there in the water, britches in the water, just not caring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau gets up, seeing Caleb a little bit messed up, and I'm going to go up to him and I'm going to grab him and be like: let's take a walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull him away. He's not present, currently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine. I'm walking with him a little bit, slowly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take my axe and I'm going to try to cut out his heart. Just in case. Very slowly, so it doesn't splatter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to wait a moment, because currently the body is being engulfed. Eventually the flames die down to the point where you can carve into its body, but most of its flesh is burned. It's definitely dead. Make a medicine check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to eventually hack away, get to where the troll heart would be, and carve it out without damaging it beyond any interest in this piece. It's a deep forest green, looks like it has half-formed additional ventricles that never fully completed. It's pretty disgusting, and you go to touch it, and your fingers--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to touch it. I'm going to use my fabric and try to get it out, like a cloth or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pull it out. It is corroding the cloth slowly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! Does anybody have anything glass or metal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put it in there!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm not going to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why? It squirted poison!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's that big. It's about basketball size.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can keep it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you going to do with that? You don't want that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to sit on the ground. I'm going to look through my stuff, see if I have anything that can hold it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go through the skulls. Do you want to join me going through the skulls right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was going to go to Caleb's aid, but seeing Beau walk away with him, I nod and go back to looking through the skulls for gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not crowd the boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to start walking over towards where the skulls are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, the concussive blast of the dynamite shattered most of the bones and any materials that were in here, so what would've at one time been fairly easy to scavenge what remains, you gather from the patches of now dried and destroyed swamp ground that much of it has been scattered all across. You do manage to find some coins between the two of you-- mostly you, Nott-- and it takes some digging. You're basically having to pan for gold here. You're going in the muck and having to sift through your fingers and pour your water out a bit, take it into the water. You manage to find roughly 26 gold pieces, ten silver pieces, and let's say about 50 copper pieces.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Quarter of what we came back for, but sure!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does his body have a pouch on him at all? Can I search the body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The body of the troll? Make another investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Febron's nasty body?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, any other items that weren't destroyed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking inside, looks like there are slivers of muscle. Fresh muscle that had been torn off of some sort of a body laid in there. The smell is a little bit putrid. It may have been in there pickling for a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Nott, I found some pickled muscle for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of species?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The slimy kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a medicine check to try and identify it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, my medicine checks are sucking. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. Probably human.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's probably human.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you shake out of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take the hide he had covering his junk, and wrap it around the heart, because obviously it can take being splattered by venom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay. That it does. In revealing the partially singed troll dong, you also manage to properly wrap the heart for its own use.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Us and troll dongs, man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each campaign. It's a through line, guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we keep the dong?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want the dong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no sense repeating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Fjord, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sitting there, watching Caleb and Yasha walk off and feeling sorry for myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Caleb, you manage to snap out of it, and come back to reality.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hand him one skin and I say: Here, this one's water. This one's booze. Take the water and I pour it out on one of my sashes and dab off his forehead a little bit. You all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool. Cool, cool, cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Y'all mind if we take a short rest or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do that. There's a campfire over there that Yasha and I made with the oil and the torch that we threw. It's already done. Let's go sit by that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sit by the skulls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a pile of bone and skull shards that is still burning and will be burning for a while from the oils.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's cozy over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get my oil flask back too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys take a short rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll give out all the gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, you pass out the 26 gold?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, so we all get three. We all get three gold pieces. I'm keeping the extras.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The downside of throwing dynamite into the reward pile.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I heal 39 points. I only have one hit dice left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys finish your short rest. You're feeling a little more collected. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we should go home, huh? I mean, back to the town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Especially since we're now a 100 gold richer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look around and see Kiri sitting there with the knife and is stabbing the troll body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't stab the troll, it's poisonous! It will hurt you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not splashing venom, it looks like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I guess get it out of your system then, that's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26 and ten silver.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you done yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Caleb) "This means we are friends."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we're a bad influence on her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think so. Kiri, would you like some human jerky?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: No, don't! No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? I thought birds might like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Don't eat human, Kiri. Don't stab humans and don't eat humans, okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Don't stab humans. Don't eat humans. Okay?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless you're really out of anything to eat. Then I suppose, you know, desperate times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do what you have to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm glad we did that. Shall we continue on our way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you okay, Fjord? You died twice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I just meant to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, three times, because the first time he snapped back up himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh that's true, three whole times!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that didn't go the way I planned. My strategy went to shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you still have the crazy eye thing in your stomach?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In my stomach?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I poke his stomach. Does it feel like there's a hard thing in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it seems classic Fjord stomach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't feel anything past the steel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You feel all six of them. Eight of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I guess we'll keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we should probably do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, did they ever come back from their little walk?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I imagine we wandered back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you shook it off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shook it off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are you, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good. Good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You faded away there for a second. Are you okay?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, what happened? You good? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He gets weird when he kills people when he burns them. He did it before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think anyone would, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if Kiri would. She'd probably be cool with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But Fjord is still here, so there is the important thing. Let's focus on the good things in our lives.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, thank you, Caleb. Appreciate that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You took care of the problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I feel like those two aren't mutually exclusive or anything, but yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's start walking!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just getting awkward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: before it gets too dark in the swamp, you manage to make your way inside Berleben proper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in the Puddles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there another inn, other than that bougie, terrible, underground situation?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you just say bougie? Ugh. God, never mind, I don't like you again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was pretty bougie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we were in the bad part of town. We can go to the nice part of town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is this word, "bougie?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When you want to try and seem fancy, but it's a little ostentatious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that in Common? Is that a Common word?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a word that people use when they want to sound ostentatious about how ostentatious something is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's short for bourgeois, which is super ostentatious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Zemnian word for that is like seven syllables long.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's ostentatious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Sending.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're going to send a message. What's the message? Completed first half of mission?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Send money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's collect when we get back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Sending and send a message to The Gentleman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Safe house cleared?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He cannot respond though, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can reply to this message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, can answer in a like manner immediately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to say: Hey, Mr. Gentleman. We found your safe house. We cleared it out of a bunch of fish people. Don't worry, everything's fine now, okay. We also found a troll in the swamp, we killed that too, and we also found some crocodiles. Please respond to this. If you need anything let us know, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And his agent is dead. His person out here is dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And your agent out here, the guy with the no teeth, is dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a moment where you hear in your mind a familiar voice of The Gentleman going, "I think "I catch your gist. Well done. Keep trucking?" You hear the confused rise at the end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He interrupted me while I was telling him what we did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, there was still more to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there was so much more, but I think he got the idea. We'll get the bonus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester's that person who keeps trying to record the voicemail and gets cut off. Aw, re-record, one more time!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or trying to send an email. "How does this work?" All caps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation near one of the lanterns, you see a cloaked figure that's sitting on a bench suddenly stand up and face you, and begin to walk towards you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, we're in the tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're walking through the Puddles.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scatter, scatter!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take to the sewers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The figure approaches. Somebody in the tech sneezed, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I pull and grab my staff a little bit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just ruin everything, there we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All I could see is somebody go (fart sound).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The figure approaches and pulls the hood back, and you see a scruffy chin, the unkempt hair, a dirtier, but excited, Horris Thrym.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, Horris! Oh, he's not dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Well, word of a motley group of strangers spreads in whispers, and I knew it had "to be you based on the description. My friends, you've come this way. This place is miserable. Oh, "do not think that I don't appreciate what you've done for me, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you're right on the nose. It's pretty miserable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this place sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As rough as this journey was, I'd rather be here than in prison. What word of Zadash has come? "Is Dolan all right?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's fine. He was sitting pretty next to the other diplomats of the town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he seemed like he was doing pretty good when we saw him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Except, of course, that they're making ready for war.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard whispers of that as well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you see that crazy army ride by? There was a lot of horses. A lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been here for over a week, so no. But I'm sure there was. How long should I stay? What "is the current atmosphere there?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a big question mark at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's chaotic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is it safe to return or should I hang low a little longer?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, it might be, because I think they decided to charge other people with the crimes and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The gates were pretty heavily watched, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were they still, though? Are they?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At war?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't remember.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perhaps wait until you receive word from him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, I'll remain in this quaint city."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, he has a better eye on the situation than we do. He's right in the thick of it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's true, I'll be patient. Thank you all so much. I really appreciate it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Horris, do you have a lot of diamonds on you? Maybe some that are worth 300 gold?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So thirsty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I don't. But if I do, I'll let you know. "

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm on the lookout, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I genuinely wish to make this up to you at some point. If it is diamonds you require I'll "begin looking."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know anywhere in town where they might have that many diamonds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stops and looks around the city and goes, "I don't know if this is the place. Call me crazy, but--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything of use or value here? At all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fish, swamp fungus, herbs."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Poisonous troll hearts!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have it? Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He steps back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where would we sell such a thing like this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He starts thinking for a second, then goes "Maybe there," and points to what is another two story building that had been burned and left to rot that now appears to be a hollow structure that is overgrown with greenery and plants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that an apothecary? Do you have an apothecary here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It seems to be from what I've noticed in passing."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god I miss shopping! I'm going to give him three gold for his trouble. You're brilliant! And I'm heading in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Thank you all. If you see Dolan, tell him please, come get me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to head back to Zadash after we take care of some other business. And we'll be sure to check in. Word will find its way to you soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are you staying right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm over at The Drowned Nest."

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: The Drowned Nest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are rooms there? Are they underground and filled with water and mold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, they're better than that place." And he points to The Keystone Pub where you guys stayed the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who would stay there right? I mean--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not to my standards."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's quaint and rustic, shut up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Drowned Nest? Do they have a tavern at The Drowned Nest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sure you could acquire a drink. Trust me, most of the folks here have to."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you feel safe here? I noticed your hood was up when you approached us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just precautions. Not a lot of business happens here that you won't get mingled in unless "you were looking. So I just stay put."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll send word. It was good to see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You as well. If you pass by The Drowned Nest, hopefully we could have a drink." And he makes his way up towards the central part of the town, the Midway Docks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man, I'm glad he's alive. I thought he was one of the dead bodies we found at the safe house.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where the hell did Molly go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He went in the apothecary! And I take off running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You approach and there is a sign that's hanging from a chain, from two iron hooks that are long rusted, this dull brown-red color. It reads across the front The Fungal Fount.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What kind of font is it written in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Papyrus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Never enter if it's Papyrus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No business back there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you approach. The door is closed, currently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I go to knock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry, we're closed."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not buying today?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're closed, it's sundown, and I'm shutting up."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Already? What time do you open tomorrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sunrise."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you sure you don't want to perhaps buy a fresh troll heart?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pause) "What?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a troll heart. It's full of poison.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very wet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got a real wet troll heart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I roll with advantage because Molly is helping?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are helping. I'll give you advantage on this roll. That was a roller coaster right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a bad die there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You two just became that Muppet meme that was made.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Closes the door behind. (lock clicking) "I'm sort of curious as to how you came across this troll "heart. Did you kill the troll?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We killed a troll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We found a troll and we killed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's amazing. I'm very impressed. Um, ah--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to see it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would like to, very much. Place it on this counter please. On the leather, which you carried."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (squishy noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches over and grabs metal tongs and starts pushing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm inspecting it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let him prod. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes a moment to look around. "I can see there's some very fascinating applications that "could come from this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There are a lot of aortas and chambers and stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is quite exquisite. I would be happy to buy this off of you. Do you have an asking price "or would you like me to make an offer?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or could we also talk about trade possibly if you have some interesting stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably you could buy it and also give us some stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you've got stuff to trade. You seem like a clever fellow, I'm sure you got something around here that's interesting and unique.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without breaking eye contact, he starts rummaging behind this small wooden table that acts as his counter. Which has a bunch of planters and potted weird-looking swamp fungus and plants that are grown together and entwined. One of them, you lean close and a little spore goes off, and you back away carefully. You hear the clinking of glass and he pulls up two small jars, opens and says, "I could spend the night preparing, perhaps, for some medicinal potions. "

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really strong ones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Strongest you'll find this side of the Labenda."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that regular? Or stronger than that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know, I have to brew it to find out. It's not a perfect art form! You are impatient."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see what you put together, and we'll definitely talk about what this is worth in the morning. And if you have anything unusual that you put together, if you have a signature blend of any kind, I'm always interested in people who are excited to experiment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unusual?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I'm more interested in the healing potions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. The morning then."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see you bright and early.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take the troll-- what's your name by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Smithe. Smithe Durban. Pleasure to meet you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Smithe Durban.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you think it would be better to leave this here, so he can contain it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean we killed a troll, it's not like we can't kill him if it goes wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope! I'm taking it with me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vex is back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 100% for sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why must you sully everything good and pure in this world, Sam?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a halfling wrapped in parchment paper underneath the shop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is where all those manacles have been coming from! Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They haven't invented the zipper yet, so it's laced.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go take a rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Goodnight, sleep well. Return please." Closes the door. (multiple locks clicking)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What a nice guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really liked him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did. I liked him a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing for the evening?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go check out The Drowned Nest, shall we? There is a better place than the Keystone Pub. We head to The Drowned Nest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's better than the Keystone Pub, but only incrementally. Entering inside, it's relatively quiet. Looks to be one person who is drinking alone on the far end, and you see across the way a female human in her middle age, a warm smile with a cracked face who glances up from a small book that she is thumbing through and goes, "Good evening folks. Can I help you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, you can. We're weary travelers in need of respite and perhaps some drinks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I can provide both. My name is Uma Cole. Pleasure to meet you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that a dirty hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh no, I keep quite clean."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you give me the dirty hand, ma'am?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was trying to process what that was referring to. "Oh, you stop." No, the hand was clean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Our selection of liquors and beers are not extremely versatile, but welcome to provide as needed."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sounds absolutely fantastic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whatever you think that we shouldn't leave town without trying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. That will be five silver per room for the night's stay."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll take them all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All four rooms? That will be two gold pieces, please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No problem. Thanks for making sure I was okay back there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What a gentleman."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I saved his life multiple times today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, good for you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, he's saved our lives dozens of times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's very dapper. He touches the hearts of all of us. Where would we be without Fjord?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All gone. All dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I mean he's not that cool or anything! I mean you probably wouldn't be interested in him at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Course not, I'm sorry."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you interested in him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here're your keys." Strangely surrounded by a group of strangers, now accosting her with various degrees of insinuation. "Drinks-wise, we prefer more hard liquors, or more of an ale beer?"

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: Hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any surprise you have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, only a couple of surprises at my disposal, but--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any ginger ale, or fresh milk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pulls up this dark green bottle, and uncaps it. "It's beer, but its practically ginger "ale. Not very alcoholic." She hands it over to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can't drink in real life and you still won't drink on graph paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A round of liquor for all of you guys will run you about three silver pieces. It's not very expensive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do that as well. It's exactly what I have.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What book are you reading?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But we do offer finer sleeping arrangements."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a busy night? Any new travelers, anyone that caught your eye coming in before us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not to the degree that you have, no."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm flattered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm going to go get a drink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got cards, I'm going to play and I'm going to drink. And we've got to discuss what's happening tomorrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: True. We'll find our way over to a table.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go get a table. Does someone want to tuck Kiri in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri at this point is leaning up on the counter towards the woman. And goes (like Jester) "Don't eat humans, okay." The woman goes, "Aw!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's the sweetest, isn't she? She's wearing a mask, she's not really a bird! And I take her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That's surprising, 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "Children and their costumes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I know, right? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She grabs her book and starts reading from behind the counter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I see the cover when she grabs the book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, it's just plain leather.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) It's Tusk Love. That's definitely Tusk Love.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We head over to a table in the corner to discuss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got your drinks. They're functional at best. This isn't a bad establishment, but it's a plain establishment. But it works. It's you guys and one other patron, who currently seems to be deep in their cups, making it on their own. They are out of earshot; you have your own table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we seem to be doing fairly well. How do we feel about setting out in the morning to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shadycreek?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Shadycreek Run.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm ready.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ophelia Mardun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was there anyone else here that we were supposed to see, or anything else we were supposed to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we are on a bit of a time crunch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to stop by this fungus place to get some potions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll do that on the way out as soon as we put the cart together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It opens at sunrise so we should be good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've done what we needed. This is a one troll town, I think. Not a great time to be had here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we can catch up on some rest. We got to get the carriage, right? Get the horses back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they're at the docks or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That means I got to go over to the-- Where did we stay before?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Keystone Pub.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got to get it from that guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He dropped them off at the place--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The central stables.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We paid way too much money to have him store our horses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but we don't know where the stables are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The central stables, we have to ask where they are. We don't have to go back to the other pub. Don't worry, Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They may not give them to us unless he's there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, Yasha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have validation, it's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, I saw you asking about that book the lady had.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to get it for you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. I would love that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I missed this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe place an order or get her attention so I can go snag it real quick.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, would you like me to try to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cast Mage Hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, why not? Another round, please! And I'll put a gold for everyone down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, she goes, "Oh, of course, I'll go ahead and get that for you." She closes the book and puts it beneath the counter and runs off and grabs the bottle that she had previously poured and shakes it. It's fairly empty, so she grabs another and then heads over to your table and begins to uncork and fill the drinks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As she's filling, I'll Mage Hand back and try to grab the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you do not see where it is. You still have to have visual.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll walk over there, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not great. 14.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could just be looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, she walks and is pouring drinks and looks over her shoulder in your direction, and is still pouring, but is looking at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kids, huh? They're always wandering off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goo goo ga ga. Do I see where the book is now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see it from your perspective, but she is watching you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uma, has anyone ever told you that you have eyes like the sea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (imitating guitar)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, nine. Come on, that's my jam!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, Uma, they are like a sky blue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She finishes pouring the drinks, caps it up, and goes, "Well, I appreciate the flattery, I "really do. Have a wonderful night." Then walks back towards where she was sitting, but as she does so, her eyes are locked on you, Nott. Goes back to her stool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it! Fjord, what was that? What was that? That's not how you talk to a woman!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not real practiced, I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Your eyes are like the sea?" We're in a landlocked part of the place here. She doesn't even know what that means.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should've said like the swamp, right? Your eyes are like stagnant water, green and-- no? Green and yellow in places.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk directly up to the bar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They look like a troll took a shit in them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can I help you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm good on drinks. I was just curious what it is that you're reading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For a question? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She doesn't like us very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she hates us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's had a bad series of minutes with you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm reading a fine story."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it fiction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am so starved for a good book. We've been in the wild for a while. I don't suppose there's-- I doubt it, but is there any place to find literature here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I had to order this from Zadash, unfortunately."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That sounds terrible. How long does it take for it to get here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, the order goes out there, and pay upon delivery. It took me the better part of a "month to get here."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I commiserate for your thirst for fiction. I struggle with it myself. How far in are you? Are you almost finished with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm about three chapters in. It's just starting to get interesting."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it a page turner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm obviously just a little bit jealous, but I don't want to take you away from your reading time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a little bit of text just barely visible at this proximity to the cover of the book, but you can't make it out in this low light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like a T, with a U, with an S, with a K. With an L--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She takes it and closes it and puts it beneath the counter. "Is there anything else I can "help you with, sweetie?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's fine, enjoy. I give her a wink and I go back to the table.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is going to drive me crazy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's fucking kill her and take the book, take everything in the place!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have been wanting to buy a bar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but you know what they say, it's location, location, location.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, this town sucks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's really not that good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go up to the bar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's just pulled the book out and looks up and goes, "Hi."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello. Here's the thing. You've made this very intriguing, this book that you're reading, and I can't leave here without knowing what it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Were you being intimidating?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The brachial artery flexes in her bicep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My intimidation is minus two but we said we can use--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it depends on how you're being intimidating. Are you going to physically threaten her to show the book?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then it's charisma-based.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got this, Yasha!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is subtle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That would be a zero. Because I rolled a two, and my charisma is minus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "I apologize, but--" (southern drawl) I apologize.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (southern drawl) I apologize.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But your behavior, paid customer or not, has been lackluster, and I would appreciate if I "could have my privacy."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will give you privacy, I just don't understand why we can't know what you're reading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why are you so interested in what I'm reading?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because it looks like it's very good! I will go sit down, fine. I miss reading. I miss it a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a book you can read, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to know what she's reading.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester and Molly, you have not tried yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dungeons and Dragons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We plan a heist for tonight. We wait until she's asleep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the morning, we'll send her for the horses and the carriage, and perhaps it's time we turn in. I pound mine. Molly, are we bunking up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm finishing this and I'll be right up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys finish up your respective drinks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I go last.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we only need three rooms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just an extra couple gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I leave two gold on the counter before I leave. For you no matter what, but if you tell me what it is, I promise I won't tell the rest of them. I just want to lord it over them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She palms the two gold. She goes, "It's called Feathered Leather."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Enjoy your evening. Cheers. And I head upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pockets the gold happily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some bard somewhere in the past has penned a story about a dark knight in leather and feathers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've seen that Tumblr post.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For the record, I tell none of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather your things, and the next morning--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, before I go to sleep, I want to use my Pearl of Power and regain a 3rd-level spell, and I want to cast Sending on my Mama. And I'm going to say: Hi, Mom! I got a new spell. I want to say thank you for the package you sent me. I know that it was really hard for you to do that and I love you so much and I hope everything's okay with you, and I got your letter and the ink and I think it's so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're talking, you hear, in your mind, this gasp. "Jester, I don't know how, but it's so "good to hear from you. Did you get my package?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, can I respond to it? Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She pauses. "Well, wherever you are, I love you, and I hope you are well, If--" and it cuts off.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe next time if you write down the words, so you can know which are the most important words.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I need to tell her I got her package.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I wasn't counting the words, but I think that gets the gist of it. Probably somewhere in there. I'm sure I'll get 14 tweets going like, "That was only 22 words." It's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three of those tweets will be from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Oh, I know, Taliesin. That's why I'm nipping this in the bud. Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we turn in turn in, it's just Molly and I in our room, right? Can I confide in you for something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yes, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you stay and watch for a second?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This seems like a bad idea. Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I'll summon the Wastehunter Falchion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it emerges from your grasp, you can see there's the slight splash of sea water across the wall. There you can see, in the center of the pommel-- previously was just the well-crafted hilt to the blade-- you see a single, yellow, lidless eye on each side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it look like anything? Does it remind me of a mystic symbol of any kind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just an arcana check. Let's see what happens. Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm back, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is more than you should've gotten, but you rolled a 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the iris move at all, or is it static?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently it's just static.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What happened to you on that boat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Um.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something might have followed you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing like this. I've never seen anything like this eye before. Only in that dream, where Vander was holding it, pushing it into his chest, but this is smaller. This sword just seems to take in things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to forgive me for this later. I cast Friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. For the next minute, you have advantage on your charisma checks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forget what Friends does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't do anything to you, it just gives him advantage on charisma checks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh okay. Oh nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I'm so sorry, not Friends, it's Charm Person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're doing Charm Person?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry, it's Charm Person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why did I ask? That's an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He resists it. You feel your mind begin to cool with subtle arcane influence and you shrug it off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's something in you that you either don't want to talk about or don't remember properly, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, you could've just asked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't think I could've.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If anything, it's the latter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's not a lot I remember about being in the ocean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is why I didn't ask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I trust that you'll tell me everything you know, but I'm not sure you even know everything you know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe, but that's why I asked you to stay in the room. I'm not entirely sure I trust this thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think it matters where the sword is at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe. Can I try and focus on the sword? I close my eyes, put both hands on the hilt, and just concentrate on it real hard? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a straight roll with your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. That's a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. You grab it and you focus, and you focus, and much like an element of the dreams you've had and the spells that you pull from whatever this agreement you've made with this entity may have been, you can feel that thread connection from you to something beyond your hemisphere. It's like that sensation of someone looking at you, and you just know someone's looking at you, and you turn to look and there's nobody's there? It's like that, all the time, right now. But, you can't read more than that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps, I think, may I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't take any offense, but no. I make it disappear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something from the deep is in that. I don't know. It reminds me of something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please, I only confided in you because I feel like the strange is your ballpark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll keep an eye, and no matter what, keeping each other safe, it's what we do. It's what you do when you got a group of people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll keep you safe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I appreciate it, Molly. I'll turn in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll probably be up for an hour, then I'll turn in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everybody. Let's go ahead and dive back in. As you all come to consciousness the following morning, a much more comfortable sleep than that you had at the Keystone Pub, you gather your things. Upstairs, there are a few more patrons in the process of waking up since there is not a meal provided for sleeping here. They are just getting out the grogginess, having some coffee, some of them having some hair of the dog, and they all go about their business. What do you want to do with your day?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to go to that shop, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go to the shop, everybody. Anybody wants to go shopping can go shopping. Anybody else wants to wrangle up the cart?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go with you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll tell Uma to go collect the cart and horses from the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to pay her to do it too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll pay her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She goes, "To pick up your money at the stables, you say, on the docks, how can I "assure them that I'm allowed to do so if I did not check them in?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is what you said!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need a valet ticket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do need a valet ticket. Did we get a valet ticket?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think that we did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I write a valet ticket really fast. Here you go! That's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You forge it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a forgery kit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not going to forge--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As much as I'm kind of into this--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, if we don't have one, you have to pay full price if you lose it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or we just kill them. I'll go down and get it myself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you might have to go--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then I'll kill them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what? I'm going to go with Fjord to get the cart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you all meet us at the-- get the cart and you'll meet us at the apothecary.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Just in case you need backup. If we need to kill them, we can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys go ahead and head off. You gather the cart, easy enough to do. You gather your supplies, they're all good to go. You guys are heading towards the Fungal Fount?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get a lot of healing potions! Oh, are we all going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the rest of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I want to go for a walk on the edge of town for something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, will you take Kiri with you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want me to come as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get a lot of healing potions!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Meet us at the apothecary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri pipes up. She says, (as Jester) "Get into trouble."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we are not going to get in trouble.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Jester) "Get into trouble."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cooing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nein.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, that's so cute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Be good. Just going on a stroll, ja? We're not going to kill anything, you're not going to, you know. Just taking a walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Caleb) "You know. Okay!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are pretty cute. Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You continue making your way to the edge of the swamp. The two of you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's our new brand mascot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doorway is partially ajar. It is open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As we walk there, I, to the rest of these four, three, say-- no! You're not there. To these two, say, all right, guys. Real talk. What are we going to do with Kiri?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been thinking about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't keep her with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's going to die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In front of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bloody. Horribly. Brutally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to be real sad about it. So we got to let her go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't just let her go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we can't let her go. But I'm saying we have to let her go from our group. Somewhere safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I try to get a hold of her parents or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you do that? Do you need to know who her parents are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't they dead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, they got separated. But we don't know yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we have a map and maybe she can show us on the map where she thinks she needs to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can't just-- what are we going to do? Just send her on her way by herself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! I didn't say that. I said if we know which direction she needs to head, we can figure out possibly if we can get her there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we need to get her out of this swamp, because this place is terrible. And I wouldn't want to live here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No one should live here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not going to subject a poor little child bird to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She does drink a lot and occasionally seem interested in eating human flesh. I'm not entirely-- well, that's a subject for another day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're right! She could grow up and run this town.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She could be like her own Gentleman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, she's her own mob boss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) I hope so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I can talk to her and have her write down exactly what her parents look like or something and I can try to send a message to them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I think that'd be good. We'll start there. Put a pin in this for now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just draw some birds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're birds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Birds. You know, there's a bird in a bonnet and another one smoking a pipe. That's all I really-- (coos) Just think about that. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way into the Fungal Fount, and there you see, waiting anxiously, there's the sallow dwarf sitting in a small chair in the corner going, "Ah, so, where is the heart? Did you "bring it?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It protects you from something. I know the basis of it is insulation."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the gold stuff in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not see what you mean."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the stuff that swirled around when you put it on the table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He taps it again and (energy crackling). It looks like a spark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. But I bet it's interesting."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we knew the name of everything we put down our gullet, there would be no fun, ever, any time. I'm very excited.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's riboflavin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will trade these and put a topper of 50 gold pieces."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm all right with this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that sounds like a pretty cool deal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm into it, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll throw in for it. I'll throw in 25 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, no. Beau, no. He's paying us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I mean--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm pulling a Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're totally pulling a Grog!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you said it was going to cost an extra 50 on top. I'm sorry. Yeah, give us that money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. If you don't mind--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deal!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He grabs the leather and carefully moves it off the table and puts it in a small chest, closes it. Goes and counts out 50 gold pieces, shoves it your way and goes, "Thank you for your patronage."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So if we were to take that 50 and possibly spend it on something in this shop, is there anything that we should take a look at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depends on what you're looking for. I have various balms and salves to help with headaches, "wounds that are festering. Some that help with helping your manhood come to light, some that help "you with sleeping if you're having insomnia--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the manhood thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They help you-- sometimes guys have problems with the (tongue click) and then there's potions that can help with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My mom said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm curious about the sleeping thing you have, and again, anything you're particularly proud of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look around the store.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm always excited for a surprise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, over about five minutes of him showing you around, they're mostly general herbal remedies for day to day ailing elements. It looks like all the special stuff that he had at his disposal went into those potions. Everything else has been general helping, like melatonin. Things that help you a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. That's five silver for ten doses."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Get the manhood thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You buy your own issue. Whatever you've got a problem with, you can buy it yourself. This is not where my coin is going. And anything that smells nice, just whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much for the whole deal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the oils and your sleeping, I'll put it around-- I'll say seven silver pieces."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you do change? One gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can." He gives you three silver back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering and giggling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're having our own story over here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm aware. I'm ignoring it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys finish up there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fine. I'm going to put it in my additional notes right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys are heading off to the edge of the swamp with Kiri.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is so silly. I'm looking for a good stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of a stone? A big stone? A skipping stone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Something with a little bit of heft to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need it for a spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something about yea big. You know, my father used to tell me that if a stone had a ring around it all the way, it was lucky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If a stone had a ring around it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, like a natural formation, a coloration, right? It doesn't matter, though. I start looking for a stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kiri, help us look for a stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A good one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll look with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping) Make an investigation check, one of you with advantage, if you're aiding the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will make the check with your help, if that's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. That is a 13.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. That is a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What particularly are you looking for?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A stone about as large as a malformed baseball, I suppose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It takes you upwards of ten minutes, not very long, until you find one that's roughly that size. It's not perfectly spherical. It's got its imperfections, but it's pretty smooth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a ring around it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say there's a very faint ring around it, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a lucky rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What will you use it for?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not sure, exactly. I have some ideas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Murdering people in their sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, Caleb, I never told you this before, but when we met that dragon lady-- Carrie? Kaylie? Kali?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cali.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cali? That's a lot of K's. She gave me this scroll of Invisibility. I've been hanging onto it, but I didn't know if you wanted to look at it and maybe learn from it, or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, does an armored bear shit in the woods? Oh yeah, I want to see it! Let me see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, here, yes. I didn't want the others to see it, just in case.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's a good one. Ja.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want it? Can you learn that now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I could use it right now, but that seems detrimental. If I had proper funding and materials, but maybe later. I'm going to keep it safe, for the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Also, I'm so sorry that I got you in trouble with Beau for the whole bowl incident. I didn't realize that she was going to freak out on you like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Neither did I, but we're figuring it out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You took a walk with her. Was that okay? Was it awkward?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, that was fine. She's probably a good egg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so, too. In her weird, sort of stoic way, she seems to care about you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, she's a prickly pear, but she's not a bad person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think she was dropped on her head or something? She's very sort of, you know-- (grunting). You know what I mean? (grunting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you and I are a little "Eh," in our own particular way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, that's true.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, she's abrasive, but that has its uses. Right tool for the right job. Right Kiri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Jester) "Go fuck yourself!" (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kiri knows what I'm talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chirping)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're good? You're still good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm very good. Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Things are looking up, I think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before. That's all. I just wanted to say his name out loud. It's been a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good name. Names are important.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. But you got your rock!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got my rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Let's rock out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kiri, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we leave, or as we're leaving the store, I want to say: Molly, stay inside for a little bit, okay? And keep talking to the guy, okay? For just a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my paint, and I'm going to change the sign to "The Fungal Fart." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Make a sleight of hand check, if you don't mind. I'll give you advantage if you manage to succeed on a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. What are you going to do with that heart anyway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I have many possible uses. I could extract all sorts of--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So just make a roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a quick flourish, you complete a fairly accurate recreation of the font utilized, in its glorious Papyrus, without him noticing from behind the door. With that, you go and complete your conversation. The rest of you meet up just as you hear the clomping of horse hooves. All of you gather in the center of the Puddles. The clomping is this splashing as there's still two inches of water in this section of Berleben. (wet clomping)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh. I think I'm getting athlete's foot from all the moisture in my shoes from this place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can heal that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? It's so itchy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's called "jungle rot."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh. Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you've got our stuff!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whose stuff?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is everything relatively all right on the cart? Doesn't look like it's been--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything's intact.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We had to kill them all, but we got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Yasha was surprisingly effective.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not surprising.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I trust you. It's the only way to be sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri comes up. (like Caleb) "She's probably a good egg."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She could've learned that from anyone. Anyone with a mildly Zemnian accent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Nott) "Yeza was his name. The halfling man. From before." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shut up! Shut up, Kiri!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Nott) "Shut up! Shut up, Kiri! Shut up!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeza?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Nott) "Yeza."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was he the halfling guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you say "Yeza," Kiri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Nott) "Yeza was his name. The halfling man. From before."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The gimp we were joking about under the floor of that place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw what?! Don't look at-- I'm turning green!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys gather your things, get back onto your cart and your horses, and head southward, exiting Berleben, leaving this swamp town behind, hopefully for good. Making your way back onto the road. Which direction are you going? You have a map.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the map?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Northeast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Northeast to Shadycreek Run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While everyone's figuring it out--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we have to go around Hupperdook.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hupperdook!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys heading to Hupperdook on the way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we can go through Hupperdook.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a ridge line there, right? There's mountains?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those are high mountains.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Silberquel Ridge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Silberquel Ridge is a very high series of mountains.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We would have to have to go around it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we'd pass by Hupperdook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are roads, or there is cutting through the open fields and nature. That's your choice to make. Looking at the map here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have some weights to put down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we have to go around these mountains. We can either go to the east past Hupperdook. Because we're going to Nogvurot, right, up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are heading this direction. As far as you know, Shadycreek, which is over here in the corner--

lines.name: SAM, LIAM
lines.text: Shittycreek.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But there seems to be the crossroads up there. There seems to be a path through the forest--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could go around Hupperdook way, or we could go Rexxentrum way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we go Rexxentrum, just because there's an army marching that direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Rexxentrum is the capital.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That place is very busy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably stay clear and go to Hupperdook.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've been up there, haven't you, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but there's a war brewing, and that place is the center of it all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you might know some folks who could help us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That man Trent Ikithon or whatever is in Rexxentrum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That Trent guy?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that Trent guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is in where? Rexxentrum?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, don't you remember? When we talked to him he said if we wanted to meet up with him to talk more, he was in Rexxentrum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought we were on a timetable to get these things done for the Gentleman.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we're trying to be sly. We want to avoid eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell you what, we'll go Hupperdook on the way up, and then we can do Rexxentrum on the way back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just going to say, I've heard some pretty crazy stories through the grapevine about what goes on in Hupperdook.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What goes on in Hupperdook?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't believe you've ever heard a crazy story about anything happening anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you challenging me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm challenging you for details.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, all right. City's got a lot of gnomes, and they're filled with industry, and they work all the time. But at night, they party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gnome parties.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Work hard, party hard. It's what that city's all about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they live in mushroom houses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know about the mushroom houses thing, but I've heard some crazy-- they have ragers every night.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've heard gnome parties are the craziest kind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you making this up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Not at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Insight check!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check, both of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as she's aware, she's telling the truth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying, I've had some shady friends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ain't no party like a Hupperdook party.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've had some shady friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hupperdook it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's "dook" it up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think they have one of the highest imports and exports for illicit substances. I don't know. That's just what I've heard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get it started.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are making your way along the Rillway Road eastward from Berleben, heading from here along Rillway. Heading past north of Felderwin, hitting the Felderwin Tillage, and then there's a crossroads that leads to the northern Gravelway Path.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going that far--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're following the roads. If you guys are cutting away from the roads and going through the rough open fields, that can be done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a carriage, let's stay on the roads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Via road, it's about 110 miles to the crosswo-- crossroads, and then 120 miles along the Gravelway Path.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To hewe? To the cwosswoads?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about a week's worth of travel to get to Hupperdook from where you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's in the cwosswoads?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll find out when you get there. You haven't traveled there before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it a village? We don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've been there, haven't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may have been there, actually. The crossroads, from what your experience is, folks who are making long travels stop there and might set up shop for a day or two to sell or trade whatever wares they have before they continue on the rest of their journey. And people from Felderwin and the Felderwin Tillage head up there sometimes to set up shop if there are people that are traveling through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a flea market town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. It's less a town, it's maybe a handful of anywhere from four to 20 tents depending on what time of year it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an outlet, outside of town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a fantasy outlet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cabazon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet I can get 300 gold worth of diamonds for way less.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need that! And our money exchange.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which, by the way, I want to talk to you guys. Here's the thing; this spell that I have takes diamonds, in order to bring you back to life. I don't have enough gold to buy all these diamonds for everybody, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you're asking if we would like to pool our resources for a handful of these diamonds for a perilous situation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah. Or if you want to be selfish about it, you can buy your own diamonds and then I'll use those for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How big do these diamonds have to be, like little suckers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't matter, it's just 300 gold worth of diamonds, but they're going to be gone if you die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a significant diamond.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you know which diamonds are our diamonds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You keep your diamonds on you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But don't you need them for the spell? Do we have a specific diamond pocket that, if we go down, you go in our diamond pocket?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's got to hold all the diamonds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! You have your own diamond pocket and then when I save you, it'll be like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're each going to have a pocket of 300 gold--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would rather you, as an accomplished healer, knew where the diamonds were on your person and got them lickety-split rather than you looking through my 32 pockets to find the diamonds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds good to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But yeah, I agree with you that we should pool our resources, that is a good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And whenever we steal jewelry off of people, maybe we keep it instead of selling it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just pop out the diamonds! We can still keep ruby jewelry and emerald jewelry--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will look for diamonds.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's all you need is diamonds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just diamonds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any spells that use rubies or emeralds? What about you, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a little diamond I use for that one thing I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But this doesn't go away?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, this one I spin it and surround it with arcane energy, and no, it does not go away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's that about? How come he gets to keep his?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you talking to the Traveler right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a very studied practice; I spent years learning how to do it.

lines.name: SAM
