lines.text: He's extremely smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the Traveler doing up there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe he can fly, I don't know! Sometimes he's invisible, could it be he's flying next to me? I don't know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you let her keep the diamonds?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could we maybe keep the diamonds?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could you teach her how to do the spinny thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could someone keep their eyes on the road as we're moving forward?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's leading the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Traveler take the wheel.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Traveler take the wheel!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While we're going, I need to sit next to Kiri, and I'm going to pull out my sketchbook, and I'm going to ask her to write down everything she can think of about her mom and dad, and draw a little picture of them, because I'm going to try to do Sending for her mom and dad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. She draws the best she can. Her drawings are rudimentary, but functional. You see two blackbird parents in somewhat geometric clothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's about how I pictured them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's American Gothic, but as birds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically. Best you can tell from what she writes down and communicates with you via the book, they were traveling from the east, heading west.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they were going the opposite direction that we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way out of Labenda Swamp, heading southward across the bridge past the river that breaks from the Ounterloch heading south.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a minor thing. While we're traveling, I'm going to use my minor alchemy to turn a ring of the wood in the cart-- I'm sitting criss-cross applesauce-- and I make a ring of copper in the bottom of the wagon and place this stone in it. I place both hands on the side of the stone and I'm trying to channel my knowledge and ability into it. I'm futzing with it, that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take a little paintbrush and I draw a smiley face on the rock.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I slap her hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there are some elements that can happen during this journey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have died of dysentery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, exactly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we ever find anything out about the Sending thing? How did that go? That's what I want to know about first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, given the lack of details, lack of information--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The fact that they can't speak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At some point, we want to pull out the map and show it to Kiri and see if she can point to anything on the map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not dead!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to get this fucking bird killed, y'all. I'm just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This bird's going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you don't quite reach the river, you almost do. First night's rest happens. For expediency, who wants to make the perception check for the evening's rest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will also do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both individually?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will do it individually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like how this is like Final Fantasy traveling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, I got a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's better. For the evening's rest-- taking your breaks, keeping watch throughout the night-- no incident. At one moment, there is a shifting of movement in the distance. Fjord, you go and check, and there is a family of foxes that are making their way through the field southward away as it gets colder. They're starting to move southward, and you spook them off to get away from the traps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next morning, you guys get yourselves back up into the cart and continue on further. You pass beyond the river and start making your way towards the crossroads before your second day comes to completion. Who's going to keep watch the next evening? All right, make the roll, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want advantage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's roll individual ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Individually. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a series of wooden signs up, and you do see three tents of varying sizes. There is a blue and white striped tent, a white tent, and a faded green one. A couple of carts are stopped off to the side, and some folks are looking in there. It looks like a very small merchant setup there, but if you were to inquire, you could see what's available.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait a second. I send Frumpkin skittering off in that direction. As he's leaving, I say, "Rub against some ankles. And listen."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who are you talking to? Are you talking to me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he's talking to the cat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be funny.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That would be weird if I walked up to you and said, "Did you want me to rub his ankles?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, sometimes when he stares at you and doesn't say anything, he is talking to you, though. So that's a fair question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I've noticed that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have you ever actually tried rubbing his ankles when he says that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can he still hear us, or can he only hear the cat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He only can hear the cat, but he can feel you, so poke him if you feel--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. What if I poke his ankles?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin listens about, and there are folks asking and trying to haggle prices. You get the sense that one of them, as Frumpkin looks up, has a small selection of fruits, some looking more tropical, probably further south-sourced, brighter oranges and yellow in color, some with vibrant green leaves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pineapple!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Durian!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The white tent goes by, has more of a general goods feel. There are tools, repair kits for travel. You see some bolts, two crossbows in the back wall, all sorts of general tools. It looks to be a general store and some basic means to defend oneself when on the road.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Any books?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Any books, 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No books. The green one appears to be mainly furs and leathers, some that are tanning on the outside, as well as bone jewelry made of teeth and bone of hunted animals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool. You guys know tents.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We also need some warm clothes. Winter's coming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some tents would be a great idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To justify all of this, he's been muttering everything he sees. Bones, bone necklaces, pineapples.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want a bone necklace, but do you guys recognize any of these tent colors?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I recognize the color green and white.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I generally don't actually care about the theme of any city that I'm in because I've never bothered to learn. Does any of this look familiar before? Do I recognize any of these people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you start walking and glancing through? No. They're all various travelers. No one has crossed your path before, nobody of significance to your previous experience, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want some bone jewelry! I walk off that way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to need some general goods. I've got some ideas of some stuff we could use on the road.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not a bad idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should have some tents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head to the green tent, those who are going, to the one that has the bone jewelry. There is a human woman there, dark, weathered skin, leather and fur over her shoulders. She's currently talking with somebody, and as you approach, "Terribly sorry. If you're looking for "furs, bones, or leathers, look around. Feel free to ask. I will tell you what we are selling for."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any bracelets? A goblin took my jade one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's unfortunate, but we do." She turns around and there's a few strips of leather that are rough on the edges but functional. One of them has a fur inlay, so it feels comfortable on the wrist. "I've made these myself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord, does this look like a little much? This feels like it doesn't go with my outfit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they thick or thin bones?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, does it feel out of place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are leather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it's just leather?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The wristband that she has is leather, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you got a thicker cloak, it would look real good with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you looking for bone in particular?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is bone jewelry. There's a bone choker that's a series of finger bones that are lined end to end that goes around the neck, there's one that can go on the wrist, looks like there's a necklace that has a bunch of various canine teeth-- not necessarily from a canine, but sharp teeth from some sort of creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where do these bones come from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, most of these were taken from various wolves, dire in nature."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Volves?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wolves."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wolves, wolves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These are from the Zemni Fields, near Icehaven is where I hail. It's a very hunter-trapper community up there. I bring the goods to sell this far south."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very impressive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin comes around a corner and Caleb sees that the entire party has left him in the cart, snaps out of it and scrabbles out, and starts hustling over that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you buy stuff as well, or do you only sell stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mainly meant only to sell, but if you have something worth buying, do present, please. I'm "curious."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got a gator skin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull it out of your haversack, it's dripping with congealed blood. Flies immediately start gathering and she's like, "Ugh."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Super fresh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can tell. Not interested, sorry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably tan this. I leave the tent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I buy the bone bracelet, throw her money, and say: thanks! And walk off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you didn't ask how much it was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bone bracelet runs you two gold. It's not that expensive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I disguise myself as a gnome, go in, and buy warm clothes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. For the set of warm clothes, which is heavy leathers and fur that you can throw over, a leather cloak as well that you can bundle up in, and it straps over and buckles multiple times across the way. For you, it runs past your legs, almost, so you'd have to trim it up a bit, but that one will run you three gold pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to hit the general store.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach the white tent, you see a female halfling there who is wearing a leather apron that has some tools tucked in there. There's nobody currently at the station, so as you approach, she looks out to you. She has frizzy brown hair with some gray ones that are starting to sprout from the outside that's pulled back and held in this giant poof of a ponytail. She looks out toward you and points and goes, "Oh, hello! Looking to buy something?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I am. How fascinating that you caught me right in the moment where I'm ready to spend money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, great. What are you looking for?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I've got a couple problems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Problems? I have, possibly, some solutions."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got a cart that keeps breaking down on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a problem."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you've got a kit for something like that. Also, I was thinking about maybe putting some canvas on top of it, giving it a little bit of safety from the elements. I think I'm going to need at least four tents. I've recently come into a bunch of new companions and they really didn't have what's necessary to make our way through these wonderful, wonderful roads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have five ready. If you need four, throwing those all together if you're buying a tent--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four'll do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How big are they? Are they four-person sleepers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're two-person tents each.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I'll get five tents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Five two-person tents. You're buying me out. That's ten gold, my friend."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's perfect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Passes them over. They're all rolled up and ready to go. "As far as repair kits go, these are "a little pricier. If you're looking specifically for cart repairs, one kit I can sell to you for, "say, 25 gold pieces. That contains all that you'd require for any on-the-road going: wheel repairs, "your axle, equipment for keeping your horses attached to your cart."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You wouldn't happen to have any raw canvas I could use to possibly put a bit of a pup tent?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Raw canvas I can do, but beyond that, the rest of it's up to you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the repair kit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "25 gold for that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And however much basic supplies to put this together, and I'll figure out how handy I am on the road.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Rolled canvas here, I've got about 20 square feet of rolled canvas. Will that do?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will that do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Will it do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm. I'm used to yards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 square foot is pretty big.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it waxed and reasonable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Reasonable. It's weather-resistant."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, we'll just have to make a little--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little bubble?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we trying to do a covered wagon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're trying to do a covered wagon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the treated canvas, if you're taking the whole bolt, that's going to be five gold."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we're at 30 gold now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "30 gold, and with the tents, that puts it at 40 gold."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 40 gold. All right, we've got the tents, we've got the canvas, and then just a little bit of lumber to put this whole thing together and that ought to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Define 'little bit of lumber.' For the structure?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, covered wagon-worth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't have much in the way of lumber. I have a few--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have bamboo? Whatever you have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no bamboo. There are wood slats, but no super-long pieces that could be curved over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, at the very least we can fake something for now. That's fair. What's my total right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "40 gold."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could do 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a nine! That's nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, I've got to make ends meet."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't argue. 40 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "40 gold. Fantastic, thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I toss Percy ten gold to reimburse him a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you did it again! That's not Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two! I got two. One more and I get a free sandwich. Is that 40 total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40 total.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was it Percy the time before too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop saying it, stop saying the name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, keep saying it, maybe he'll start rolling better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got his head shoved up the ass of a clock right now, leave him be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a savage burn. Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you guys need?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm heading back to the cart, spreading out the leather hides, and making them dry out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what is Fjord doing right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is Fjord doing right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's holding an invisible phone, scrolling social media.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Checking Tinderbox?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any sweet half-orc around here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look bored out of your mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not much of a shopper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Same, same. Me either. So far, so good, though, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's been without incident, which is what we want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean the lot of it. We've been together for weeks, now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's been some friction, but we're still here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everything's got its little bumps and growing pains, and I think we've had ours. You and Beau seemed to make up nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, hell, that was nothing to when you held a blade to my throat. But we're making it work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a good guy, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think so too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What does he look like when I say that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you look like when--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He smiles at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I know what your face looks like. What does it mean? Double rainbow, what does it mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a pleasant smile.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, Caleb! They have rambutan, they have lychee, they have jackfruit, they have all sorts of different fruits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you just say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have all kinds!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's a lychee?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a white little-- it's got a big seed, it's white, it's sort of citrus-y, it's really good. You can put it in liquor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am from the north. We have Brot, tomatoes, and cheese and that's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They may have tomatillo, I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really exotic stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, you teach me. Good talk. Okay, show me what you're talking about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come, come. Do I recognize anyone in any of these tents?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You do not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a dirty picture!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No it's not, it's a ballerina.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that's a dirty picture.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else you guys wish to do? Or do you move on? Okay. With your supplies gathered, you load up back into your cart, and now shifting over to where you see the signs. The directions show: NW - Rillway Road to Berleben/Labenda Swamp, NE - Gravelway Path to Hupperdook/Silberquel Ridge, and then S - Rillway Road to Felderwin/Alfield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We want the Hupperdook one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: NE, Hupperdook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Making the left turn onto that road, heading northeast, you begin to make your way towards the Silberquel Ridge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess we're going slower than that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! Should I have asked if Kiri was cold? Do you get cold, Kiri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kiri's sitting there on the edge, eyes half-closed, and her feathers all puffed up. She looks over towards you, (coos).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you get cold? Yes? Or No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (like Jester) "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You get cold. Oh, I run back in and try to get some warm clothes for Kiri.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, easy enough. It costs you three silver to get the proper thick fur material to give her enough to keep warm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Something really pretty though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eh, beggars can't be choosers in this circumstance, but you get something functional.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Burlap, it's all burlap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or really itchy wool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continuing northward, as the sky gets subtly darker and darker, preparing for what is the coming dusk, you see ahead a caravan of carts heading southward along the road that's going to intersect with your path.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? What's ahead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A caravan of four carts, heading your direction, heading southward and going to cross your path.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was impressive. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing ahead, there's still enough light for you to make out details. They appear to be mostly human from what you can tell. Looking behind there looks to be a group of dwarf family members all gathered. They appear to be families.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they look like fancy wagons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't. They look like wagons. And as they begin to approach, they turn and give you a wide berth like they're about to make room to travel past you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be a diamond shipment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should ask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Howdy! What news from the road up ahead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gentleman at the front puts a hand up and the carts slow down a little bit. "Nothing, "just passing through."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No dangers? Clear roads?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Roads are clear so far."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do the faces of the people who aren't talking look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. There are men, women, children. Mostly human. Three of the carts, one of them is a dwarf family. They all look somewhat nervous. General looking out, quieting the kids.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you been to Hupperdook?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We rode past, didn't stop."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see the mushroom houses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you party any? Quick rager after the kids were asleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. I'm sorry, we must be going."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was no blazing drum and bass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The horses pick up their pace a bit more.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't believe you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do the kids do as they move on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The kids just kind of watch quietly as they begin to pass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't like his demeanor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. (shouts) Where are you going? Are you safe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) We are the worst people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks back and says, "We're heading south."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouts) What are you reading? What are you reading? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're just passing through. Heading south."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look at one of the kids. (whispers) Are you safe? Are you good? Are you safe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The kid kind of recoils from this blue-skinned, horned tiefling all of a sudden engaging him from across the way. The kid just kind of freezes in place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. I feel like they would've said if they were in danger or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trafficking kids?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm afraid it's like... I don't know, I just feel like somebody's not safe there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll cast Message on one of the kids.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll say, if you're being kidnapped, you can respond to this message and tell me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks over and sees you and kind of... "No, we're just getting away... from our home."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was like a real connection!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ask what's happening at their home!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll cast it again. Where's home? You can respond to this message!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nogvurot."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nogvurot. Oh, that's where the people have been getting stolen from! People are getting stolen, remember?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait. Yeah, Nogvurot is right where we're going. We're going past Shady... Shadycreek.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's been a string of kidnappings there in town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this is where you're going, and Nogvurot is this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay, so we can sort of avoid--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go straight, or you can arc-- it'll take more time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But they're next-doorsies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should avoid Nogvurot right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can hit it on the way back. It's up to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. On the way back. On the way back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: After we've already taken care of the stuff so we get paid. Do we know how much time we have left before our time is up with the Gentleman's timeline?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh, with the days of travel... I'd have to go do the math again, and I'm sure that the Internet knows and has been keeping track--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're probably fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll check in with CritRoleStats to make sure--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Caleb will tell the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But since you've left, just estimating right now, I'd say it's been about a little over a week as of now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we have a month.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a month.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're killing it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. This is going to be the hard stuff now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's continue on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're basically gods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is futzing again with the rock and just sort of massaging the four days of stubble that he has grown back, and his facial hair comes in as fast as Liam's does so it's already pretty thick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You pass the caravan and they continue southward. Eventually it gets dark, if you guys want to stop and make a rest for the evening, you can. So, as you set off and set up camp, who's keeping watch this evening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got tents!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll keep watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you travel further north, you know, it's going to get colder, especially with the winter looming and the autumn coming to a close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, who's keeping watch?

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: Yasha and Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or one of you with advantage. Your choice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beau's just looking at Yasha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her bad. Did you see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Except for your eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're like the ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her eyes are like the sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your eyes are like the swamp. Super muddy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your eyes are like blue crayons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One's like the swamp, one's like the sky.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, one's like more purpley, but I guess that's sky, or swamp?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It's very like, very diverse biodomes in your eyes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispers) How?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not biome. Biodome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Biodomes, you know?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like a... I think that's a film?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, like-- Yeah. Waterworld.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pauly Shore movie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're off the rails. We're off the rails.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The evening passes without issue, actually. Keeping a watch--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You call that "without issue?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's natural. It's in my blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Touche.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're so cool, how do you fucking eat gravel so hard? Oh, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's in my blood, man. It's all a ruse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that passage over or through is very specific. Or at least nowhere in visible sight. As you guys begin to crest into dusk for this next, fourth evening of travel, who's keeping watch?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys go ahead and roll perception checks, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. All right. As you guys are just setting up, Caleb, you're looking out past as everyone else is getting ready to bed for the night, and you look over and you can see what looks like a shape off in the grass. Looks like a-- like a big mound, but it's hard to tell from this distance, but there's something in the grass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's something deadly out there that wants to murder us all in our sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it could just be an animal or something, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it could be. Do you want to wake everybody up, or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not yet, let's find out what it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I can't see shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go look. You stay here and be ready to wake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, well, hold on a second. Just wear my cat as a scarf. And she digs-- dammit, my cat was a girl, but-- never mind. He digs his claws into Nott's neck and hangs in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll flank around and try to see if I can see what this thing is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Caleb sits between Fjord and Beau and loses his sight and vision and listens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus ten, but it was a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still a natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck a duck! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get out of my eyeline! Get out of my eyeline, Wil Wheaton! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a 30-foot radius!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have sunglasses or anything I could wear? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to slowly approach, make a perception check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I get to make a perception check through Frumpkin's ears?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yass!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Queen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a two! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You hear nothing. You glance around the corner, and just beyond the grass, you can see an overturned cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not ours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yours. Another cart. It's just on its side. It looks like it has a cover over the top of it. But it's not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that's not where we saw movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we just saw a hump, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw the shape. And the shape, as you approach, looks to be an overturned wagon, roughly about 100 feet off the road.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I will cast Silent Image, and I will make it look like there's just a curious human walking over there. (bad American accent) Hi, I'm an American man! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out a wire and say, You're onto this, right? This is a possible ambush, ja?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seems like-- yeah? So, Chent goes over there and checks it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chent?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When have you ever met a Chent?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, good old Chent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I already hate him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Walks over there. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He got a sweater around his neck and mid-thigh khaki shorts?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crocs? Is he wearing Crocs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell your man to check the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's over there investigating. Nothing? Okay. I will withdraw him if nothing has happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't-- I take out my wire-- I didn't see anything move. I think it might just be a cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably but give it a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell him to do the Running Man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja I can relate, but just do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: White man's overbite, white man's overbite-- there it is!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't handle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 15 now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. You see a brief-- a split-second of movement. And you look and you see a crossbow bolt hit the edge of the cart--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Near where Chent was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Near where he was standing. Who is still dancing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. No direction? Can I tell from its impact from whence it came?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from this distance, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. (panicked breathing) Crossbow attack! Crossbow attack! Wake up everyone! I'll take them out single-handed!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, no, switch to the Cabbage Patch! And I start punching Fjord and Beau in the shoulders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shh! Quiet! Be quiet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to keep flanking around in the shadows, trying to stay out of trouble. Crossbow at the ready.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start quietly handing over everybody's mouth, "Wake up, there's an ambush!" I'm scared of Yasha but I do it anyway. "Wake up, there's an ambush!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As all of you come to consciousness, you glance over and you can see the dark shape, once Caleb points out the direction where it was. And as you're coming around the side, Nott... because you did not roll a very good stealth--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, not at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You went forward and did not retreat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was trying to flank around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer six points of piercing damage as a crossbow bolt catches you in the thigh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans) I will reduce that to three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You glance over to the side and you can see what looks to be a humanoid shape that darts down into the grass and begins shifting around the other side of the cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb will, at this point, once everyone is awake-- Yasha was the last one-- go back in to see what is going on. Oh, shit. (stammering) Nott's being attacked. Let's go! And I jump out of the cart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I see where the creature went?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It ran down through the grass-- actually, make a perception check, just as you're trying to peer through the darkness here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have no idea. They vanished into the grass and moved what you assume to be around the cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am doing my best Vax impression and making my way through the grass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The rest of you following?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys are all--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I start walking towards the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not carefully, just straight-on run in that space?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Spread and flank? Spread and flank?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still stealthing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still stealthing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm trying!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the slow pace at which you are approaching, at that many feet away--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Four. Okay, Fjord and Molly lumbering across the field. In the meantime, two other figures jump up from aside the cart, and both take crossbow shots at you. That's going to be a 16?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Armor class is 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just hits. And the other one is-- that's a 12. That doesn't hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this one... you're going to take four points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I already used my, whatever, reaction, so I'll take the full four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They both kind of duck down behind, using the cart to put a buffer between you and them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So now I kind of know where they are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know where they are, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they're hiding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hiding in the grass. Caleb, light 'em up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are rushing in that direction. You can see, you see two figures dart up and then Nott kind of like (grunt). Nott is very visible in the field.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I use my action to message them saying, "There's two or three figures behind the cart!" and then I'll hide?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Caleb heard Fjord say that and just went (fwoof) and there's four globes floating above us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Invoke Duplicity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you Invoke Duplicity. As Jester's stealthing below through the field, two Jesters suddenly appear where once there was one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to send her out next to Molly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Molly and Fjord, you guys rush forward as the little globes of light all of a sudden light the area up a bit, like it has a very faint lantern light in the vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to move on the opposite side of where Nott is and do like a quick runaround and try and flank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, just swinging wide. On Beau's side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys rush around, Yasha, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm swinging wide. Go around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 19 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their heads swing over in that direction. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Taking out the closest guy that's to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the one that's closest to you is the one that shot Molly. He popped out of the grass as you were pulling around the side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The one who's yelling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the other one. The one that's shouting is on the opposite end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're really spread out? How spread out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say if you're looking at where the cart is, there's two on the sides here that were in the grass, and there's three that are directly behind the cart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roughly how far apart are those two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 60 feet apart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to hold Slow for one side of the group if I decide they're a threat, if they sound like a threat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have to release it next round or the spell's lost.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You prepare, you're readying Slow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see any visual of the face of whoever is yelling that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not able to hide at the moment, but you don't see any features or details as you're rushing up. Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they see that Chent is now doing the Sprinkler?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are aware.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice that all of them have thick green cloth masks that cover the front of their faces, bandit-style, that cover most of the features.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm cracking the one on the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. As you rush up, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he see me? I'm trying to do this stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just finished firing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, while his attention is diverted, I'm going to come up behind and try and do a crack. Go to sleep, go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have advantage on this or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first attack you do, because he turns and sees you at the last minute as you approach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. That's 12 damage, and I'm going to do stunning blow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Stunning Strike?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stunning Strike. Is that a ki thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it spends a ki to do it. Yeah, he does not succeed. He rolled a natural eight. He's (groaning) kidney punch right to the side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to cover his mouth and lay him down in the grass, and do another blow to his temple to try and knock him out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And kill him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, just knock him unconscious. Do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll with advantage, because he's stunned currently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20! Thanks, Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (whack) and his eyes roll back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shushing) Lay him down in the grass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quickly, declare yourselves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one guy stands up-- the guy who yelled out-- and goes, "We are so sorry! We are so sorry! "We didn't know it was you folks! Our most sincere apologies." The other guy is like, "What the fuck "are you talking about?" He's like, "You don't understand. These are the ones that--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How's new management working out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These are the ones that ashed Trevor!" The guys put up their hands. "Oh shit. We're so "sorry!" They drop their crossbows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb lets Slow fizzle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We didn't mean nothing. We're so sorry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to fire one crossbow bolt at that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's only a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's leather armor. It hits. They're not very strong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Oh! Come on!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't feel good, does it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now, now. Is that apology accepted at this point?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys have healing potions, because you just sent a lot of arrows at Nott. I mean at this-- I mean--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said her name. It's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seriously, this is a huge misunderstanding."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to put this out here, that we just received an apology. This sort of behavior should be rewarded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know the drill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Thank you!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take off your pants and walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because you're living.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a one. No pants for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw. No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We appreciate the courtesy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls the mask down. "Take the cart. Take it. That's yours. We'll just--" The other one's like, "What the fuck are you doing, mate?" He's like, "Trust me!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, we have a cart. We're good. Is there anything in the cart that is more interesting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever's in it, it's all yours."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back away from that cart, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, that we do. Guys, gentlemen, back away."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's rough out here; they should take their crossbows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not taking their clothes, but I am interested to see what they are carrying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is very fair, let's take a look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that your cart, or did it belong to someone before you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It belonged to someone. They're alive. We didn't kill them, but we took their stuff and we "sent them on their way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you bullshitting us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you bullshitting me now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking in his cart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I'm laying in the grass with the guy who I knocked unconscious, I'm going to pat down his body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a 15.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20 again! That's two 20s in a row! Counter Wil Wheaton!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, glancing inside and looking through and rummaging and pulling, most of the cart stuff is gone. It has some simple grain bags and things that were placed deliberately to look like it had a lot, and they shoved all of it towards the exits of the two sides of the cover, but the interior of it is mostly empty. You see two blankets. That's about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How's this working out for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Obviously not very well right now."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you better or worse than when you started?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard enough to make ends meet. We're doing "what we need to to survive. We're happy to give you this. We'll walk away, and pretend this never "happened."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel bad, I've got to admit. No, I have to deal with this. I'm going to walk to my cart. I'm going to pull out that armor that I got at the orc's place. I'm handing it to the kid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What? I don't understand."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to get shot at again. It's breaking my heart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You really can't find a safer line of work?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Learn from your mistakes. What the fuck are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing with your lives?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He grabs the armor and tucks it in. "Thank you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really nice, and that should be rewarded in this world.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three strikes and you're out. This is two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, no. Yeah."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They said they wouldn't be bandits anymore, but they are bandits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I wasn't really holding them to that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. The next time, we are going to turn you into grease puddles, so maybe find yourselves a job in a store, or a dock, or a restaurant, even.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, don't go working for criminals! That's stupid!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At least be good at it if you're going to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think they're freelance, Jester. They work for themselves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Then if you're going to do bad things, at least work for somebody who's rich and doing bad things! Don't just steal from people on the road, that's stupid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of the guys go like, "Yeah, no, she's got a point." "I know!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk up to this guy, and I take the stone out of my pocket and I place it against his forehead, and I mutter a few words under my breath. And now I know where you are at all times, and I will know if you are still doing this kind of work, and I will come and I will kill you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check with advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Over here is our safe haven from that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's nodding. You can see the sweat on his brow, and you can't help but notice the darkening spot in his nether regions. "Of course, no worries, sir, I promise, no worries. We'll go and "we'll slop pigs. We'll do what it takes, anything but this. Right, boys?" They're like, "The fuck? "You pissed yourself."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Respect management.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah." They pick up their crossbows and tuck them under their arms. "Good night. Safe travels."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Only steal from grumpy people!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good night." The guy next to you, as you're patting him down, two things. One, you manage to get about seven silver from him. That's all the money he has on him at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Hey, big spender!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a hard spot on the side of his stomach that he should probably get checked out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because he doesn't have anything else, but she rolled a 20 investigation check! I didn't know what else!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to steal his money and he's got medical problems.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, he's a warlock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As they all leave, Beau peeks her head out of the grass and goes: I knocked one unconscious, and I don't know what to do with him now. I could've let him go, but I didn't want to say anything in front of everybody because I started feeling bad once you guys felt bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have to heal him now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're probably doing him a favor, all right? He'll wake up in the morning. No one will be here. He'll start his life, it'll be a new chapter. It'll be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, they're going to leave him. We've got one more of your-- This one, take him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, there's a sound behind you, a (huffing). You see Kiri running with her knife, going, (like Cali) "I kill people!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't kill this corpse! Don't stab this corpse!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not technically a corpse yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, but she'll think it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they can take Kiri.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No way!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, we need to get rid of Kiri!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so terrible!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give her a life of adventure and imminent death.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take this guy's green mask, and his pants, and I give his pants to Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Write that down in your equipment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got pants!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bandit pants!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to add it because I think I already have some bandit pants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. He starts to come to consciousness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no! (thud) Oh, fuck! Sorry, it was a reflex!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lay him in the grass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His friends have all run off northward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your friend is-- They're bad friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'll be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He'll only find better people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I try to lay him down gently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's drooling down himself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn him on his side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does he have any coin on him at all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I already took seven silver. These guys sucked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here, I put two gold in his pocket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Judging by the map, how far are we from any town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are about here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, this guy's going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're about 24 miles away from the crossroads.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away are his friends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see them at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He knows where their hideout is, he's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull my wire out, and Message the one who I intimidated and say: you left one behind, he's here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 120 feet, I think. I'm going to check it out. It's 5,000 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He'll be fine, he's a bandit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That went well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Jester. What if we take him and we pose him, and we put a drawing around him just in case anybody else finds him, and maybe they think there's something wrong with this guy? A sign? I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The good news is, we're in the middle of the wilderness and no one is going to find him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was trying to be jovial, I'm sorry. I shouldn't have tried that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we put some flowers in his hair, so when he wakes up, he looks really pretty?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good. Let's do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing better than waking up in the morning with no pants and flowers in your hair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a dagger, and I'm going to shove it in his belt so he's not totally alone. He's pantsless, but with a dagger, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pantsless with a crossbow, and a simple shortsword that's tucked off to his side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I didn't see that. I take my dagger back. He's fine, he's got a blade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hair is filled with flowers, he's on his side, flopping away from the sky. The cart's there if there's anything you need to grab from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I add a drop of lavender oil and I think we're done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was there anything in the cart? No, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's blankets. We can take the blankets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a couple blankets, there's grain, and it has a cover on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this is why you buy the lavender oil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Molly, they have a covered wagon!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we can remove it and attach it to ours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we can take theirs and leave ours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is theirs better than ours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cart is comparable, probably a little more weathered than the one you guys have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is so dumb. What color is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a basic canvas. It's a tan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is Oregon Trail.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all about the dysentery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a tan, light brown.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a Florida convertible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Volvo of wagons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially. Ironic that you went looking to build that and it was already in the possible path. All right. So you guys pull that off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Take the blankets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take the blankets. Make your way back to your cart. Finish up your evening's rest, and at morning light, continue your way northward along the road. All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (clopping sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's some tiny-ass hooves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the sake of brevity, since we're getting towards the end of the evening--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should take the grain for our horses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Horses eat grass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's count the grains.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god! Let's travel north, for fuck's sake!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to head in this direction, you can also see that this lower area, this industrial field of various engines of warfare that are in the process of being constructed, some in their skeletal phase of being built. To the base of the mountain above that, you can see two winding switchback roads as well as one very steep staircase that ascends to a second level, about a hundred or more feet above the first. Here you see a massive outcropping of leveled rock that holds the other half of the city. There along the ridge of the mountain shelf lies hundreds of buildings and arches, occasionally dappled with an autumn-colored tree. Behind this city mass, you see a shimmering waterfall that cascades from out of the center of the mountain, about 1000 feet up, that glimmers like silver-white light and the little bit of sun that's coming through the clouds. You've reached the outskirts of Hupperdook.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is not how I pictured it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told you it's a city of industry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like a good waterfall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are the EDM gnomes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, that happens at nightfall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it mostly gnomes that live in the city?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think mostly gnomes, but I'm pretty sure there are other people. I don't know. I've never been here. I've only heard stories.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like the buildings are teeny?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From best you can tell from this perspective, make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell. The buildings that are in the outside of the upper ridge look to be varying sizes. They don't appear to be super tiny, by any means. You do see from this perspective, as you're heading down to the base of the mountain, you're at the top of the hill, and this last leg as you start pushing in towards Hupperdook, at the base of where the waterfall is hitting, behind that row, you can see what look to be numerous towers, thin and tall, like these weird needles of buildings that kind of cluster around the base of the waterfall. That's as much as you can make out at this distance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On a scale of one to ten, one being like a shit-ass swamp town and ten being like Rexxentrum, what does the civilization of this city look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The technology, as you get closer and closer and begin seeing these fields of construction, the industry is pretty prominent. It's the most you've ever seen. As far as the beauty of a living, civilized town, five or six, maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But not podunk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not podunk, by any means.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's builded?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The base area around the mountain as you begin to approach-- and you can see now where the clouds and bits of steam are mingling and rising up, mixing into the sky above you-- the colors here are fairly drab: browns, grays, dark graphite metals. And immediately, you can see the ground itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (coughs) That's good water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the ground itself as you step in the area has a faint layer of soot where some of the burned materials that are pressed up into the air have come down to settle onto the ground surrounding it. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time of day is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's mid-afternoon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) We should be going to the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quietly) I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we'll ride into the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like sleep somewhere comfortable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is your business?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looking for lodging for the evening. We've been on the road for some time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood. You would probably want to go ahead and head up the mountain for that. Down here "is all industry."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All industry? Where would we be looking for further up the mountain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He points out, "This is the Iron Lot and the Assembly Yard. You're going to want to head up to "the Idleworks Shelf to find lodging."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Idleworks Shelf.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Idleworks Shelf, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any recommendations? Favorite spots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The most prominent and most lively would probably be the Blushing Tankard tavern."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do like alliteracy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blushing Tankard tavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I-i-illiteracy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Alliteracy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Alliteration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Illiteracy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not often you find people a fan of illiteracy, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like unlearnt folks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we appreciate it. We'll head on up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this faint buzzing and clicking sound as you see some of these large wheels that are affixed to the outside of these large towers are grinding. You can see platforms rising up with the gears turning. And on them, you can see numerous gnomes, male and female, in the process of what looks to be building materials lifted onto higher levels. You could see some of these war machines that are being developed and designed here, mid-construction. You get the sense that with the call of war, they're probably put into high gear in developing whatever siege weapons they can possibly muster in the short time frame. And the furnaces are going well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And when you say "war machines," how do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure what animal would be able to pull that. You also see siege towers, 30 feet tall, wheeled, with a number of ladders and platforms inside that are used to clamor up against fortresses. You see one that looks almost like a giant battering ram that is in the process of being constructed. The interior metal rod is currently resting on the ground next to it and they're building an outer frame. Looking past, on the far end-- on the northern end, you can see a huge cannon, maybe about 15 feet across and about three to four feet wide in the middle. That one is on a platform. The wheels are currently resting in the side and they're in the process of finishing the construction of the device. Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Just beyond that, on the northern side, as you guys are riding past, and you kind of get as much height as you can, beyond these towers and what was referred to earlier as the Assembly Yard, which is the area where all these war machines are being built, you can see a roped section that is just pock-marked craters and scarred ground, what you assume to be some sort of a testing ground for whatever they've been working on over the numerous decades or more they've been here. You're not sure-- actually, roll a history check, because I'm curious to see how much you know about this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sing-songy) Don't fuck me, Gil.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He did it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucked me pretty hard. That's three. Can I use my mystical erudition to get an advantage on history checks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll allow it this time, but usually, you have to decide that before you make the roll. It's not a lucky feat, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deciding it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But going forward--

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: Not much better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At all. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You haven't learned that much about the history of Hupperdook. You know it's been here for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This scarred pot-marked line?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This city. It's been here for quite some time, so while you're not sure of how long that field has been there, you get the sense that this isn't a recent testing ground. It probably has been their general testing ground for any technology they're developing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So it's not new. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about, you see more crownsguard attire, though now you're starting to get to more gnomish crownsguard who are established there. And on their backs, as opposed to spears or shields at the ready, you see similar weapons to what some of the army moving eastward were carrying. You see long metal rods affixed with a wooden buttress at the end. These strange firearms that have been carefully relegated to certain individuals here are a little more in use here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any platform shoes, glowsticks, or pacifiers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are there any flowers that are even visible at this area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pink hearts, yellow moons.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Perception check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Purple horseshoes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Blue diamonds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Red balloons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The outskirts of this, whether it be just the heavy amount of smoke and soot that's put out by the industry, there isn't a lot of grass. What is here is pretty harsh scrubland. You glance down, though, and one of the small bushes does have a very unique-looking white bud. They haven't opened yet, but they're beautiful amongst this stark ground. And you could reach down, if you wanted to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I reach down and I take it and put it in my book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You grab, pluck a couple of them and put them in your book. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There'll probably be something siding closer to the waterfall, maybe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I'll get more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are the guards still within earshot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as you approach, you hear this (thud). And looking up, you can see these chains, these big, heavy, dark chains that are shifting. And as it does, you can see this platform begin to lower from the city above, heading in your direction. In front of you, at the base of the mountain, you can see there are a few other individuals that are sitting there, waiting patiently. You can see this platform eventually comes down, seems to be one of many means to make your way to the second part of the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will our whole cart fit on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a lift.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold the elevator.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that seems safe to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have to pay for it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It will be fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you approach, you see there are four crownsguard, one dwarven, three gnomish, that are there waiting it. You see the few figures that were waiting patiently. They appear to be well-dressed, human, one half-elf, wearing what looks to be reds and gold velvets. They look to be relatively well-off, standing definitely out of place in this rather dark space. They step onto the lift, and as you approach, the guards put their hands out. "I'm sorry, who are you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are guests here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Looking for lodgings for the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lodgings? Well, you'll have to take the path upward. This is designated for guests of "Hupperdook."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what we are. We're guests of Hupperdook.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Guests of whom?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hupperdook.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Guests of Ophelia Mardun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. That one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll have to take the path."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not our fault. She's very important. I would hate to keep us out of her good graces. I feel like the pull she has in this city should be more than enough to allow us to use the lift.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I guarantee you, sir, I've never heard the name before in my life. But there is always the path."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For the rest of your evening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course." He takes a small pistol out from his side and aims it in the air and it fires with a puff of smoke, and the chains begin to lift.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man. Come on, I really want to be on it! Come on, man. Let us get on, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't need that ride.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What the hell was that thing he shot in the sky?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a firecracker, that's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are frustratingly fuming over that not-quite-as-positive experience, a voice from around behind you goes, "Well, now. You look like you're not from around here. Is that true?" You turn and glance behind you and you can see, through a surly grin and a curly mop of brownish-red hair, a female gnome in her young adult years wearing simple clothes, some leather gloves. She has dangling around her neck a set of eye protectors. She's rubbing a little bit of soot from her chin. "So. You couldn't take the lift."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we could have, if this guy, he would have listened to us, because we are really important people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Honesty."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Self-deprecation? Oh, honesty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, probably both, depending on the time of day. So, who are you, if I might ask?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're the Mighty Nein.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Travelers passing through to somewhere else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're not from around here? I like that. What brings you to Hupperdook?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We thought the name was funny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is accurate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her brow furrows and a smile curls even wider across her face. "You're not wrong. You're "not wrong. Well, I happen to be a local looking for a way to kick off some boredom. Mind me "showing you around?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My name? Rissa. Pleasure to meet you, Mr.--?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fjord. Mayhaps we be getting in some trouble, too."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hear you people like to get in trouble here at Hupperdook.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Especially at night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We got about two hours."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's like 4:00. Wow. Amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, at this time, it'll probably be about dusk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's like 8:00. Crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to find a place to store our stuff and hopefully find an inn for the night, first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Follow me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's nice. Why? Let's kill her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have this tourism look to us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For sure we do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should get some fanny packs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like an amazing fanny haversack?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. You don't know what's in there. Keep pulling stuff out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She says, "I get the sense you don't know much about us here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, no charge. Or buy me a round, or five, and we'll call it even."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you want?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye on her, because I think she's going to try to steal some of our stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. "That's all I ask. Maybe help me fuck with a friend or two."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just say yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's just like us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're visitors here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Beau, you make really bad first impressions, too. She's basically you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks to Beau and is like, "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I nod back. Hmm, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, don't worry. I know the place is a bit droll, but once the sun's down, it gets "interesting."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: During all of that yammering on the way up, I look over at Yasha and sigh out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. A little crazy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you saying you are crazy? I mean, you did that in front of everybody. Are we having an agreement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) I am crazy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I can see that about you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're busy most of the time. General workday "here is about ten to 12 hours. No weekends, no breaks like the rest of you lazy and lackadaisical folk."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Private contractors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough. Give you a quick tour of the place, should give us right about time to get some drinks."

lines.name: TALIESIN
