lines.text: Drinks is a great idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably 80 percent of the people you see in the immediate vicinity at any point in time are of gnomish heritage, only offset by the occasional dwarf and some human, half-elf. That's as much as you've seen in your path here so far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we, as a much taller United Colors of Benetton pack, draw a lot of attention as we walk through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you do as you do. You are a very colorful ensemble whenever you enter any sort of new establishment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have we seen another tiefling since hitting the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's almost like the town is a ghost town, where it's dead outside of those that are in the process of making errands or doing runs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it sooty up here too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little bit, but not as bad as below. At this point, your friend, Rissa, is pointing out in different directions and goes, "All right, then that's over that way. This is the center of "Hupperdook culture here on the Shelf, where most of the folks come to unwind. Beyond that you can "see what's called the Silver Falls, pointing over there. That's the core of where most of the "residents live, sleep, make their families, amongst the small towers you can see." And from this point you can now see those strange, finger-like protrusions that were guarded around the waterfall are very condensed, thin, and tall metallic towers that have balconies and little windows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, it's a condo. It's a condo complex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks not safe, though they probably are. It's a very unique living situation you haven't encountered with any other people in the Empire and beyond. Glancing up, you can see there are a few folks that are out there in the process of laying some rugs out and hanging them over the side. One woman up there is throwing some seeds to some birds that float by and start eating off the edge there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rissa, you mentioned culture. Are there any libraries here in Hupperdook?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sure there is. Not anything I've bothered with, though. Not much of a reader. My "father, well, he might know, but you don't want to talk to him."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where do the best parties happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just wait. Be patient. Be patient."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you live on a high floor or a low floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I choose to live on a low floor."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Less stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. Gets warmer up top, anyway. Don't want that."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The walk-ups are tough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're telling me. Want my quads to be ready in case I need to go into a sprint. Run for "my life. You know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you build the machines down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I used to. Occasionally."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you do now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I supervise."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Supervise what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're being a bit nosy here, not going to lie. I know we just met, and I'm helping showing "you around, but--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You offered, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I offered to tell you about the city, not about myself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're a motley group of assholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think you'll fit in quite well around here."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you get fired?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. My. God.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? I just want to know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was trying to defuse--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you gave her information, so maybe she'll give us some. Did you get fired? Suspended?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I haven't found a vocation that fits my personality. Tried some things. Wasn't my thing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Undecided major. I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where should we stay tonight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, there's a few different places. Are you looking for a quiet spot to sleep or are you "looking for a wild place to not sleep?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beau is looking for a wild place to not sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Blushing Tankard it is."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gushing Tankard.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Blushing Tankard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, the oranges and reds of sundown have taken the sky and you hear this pop sound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up and you can see splashes of light in the sky above you. Faint fireworks start going off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are the Dodgers playing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start hearing shouts. Voices echoing from the city, from the towers, from behind you, along the Shelf. All these steam whistles start going off down below, echoing from below. The streets suddenly come to life as people begin to rush out of buildings, taking off their aprons, taking off their gloves, setting off whatever their work attire is and rushing off to home to unwind. There is a rush of energy, and you begin to realize Beau wasn't kidding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a party town!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This city's awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They work hard, and at night, they play hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've brought us to Florida.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Steampunk Burning Man!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Orlando! Orlando!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fourth Street in Austin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll pick up this next week. We may or may not have Ashley, depending on if Skype is available.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But the following week I'll be here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nevertheless, thank you guys so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Wil Wheaton, for not ruining our lives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy about that. Thank you guys for joining us tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
